title: TurboTax Tax Return App – Max Refund Guaranteed
description:
Snap. Tap. Done. Snap a photo of your W-2 or 1099-MISC, answer simple questions about your life, and e-file securely from your mobile device. Free to start, pay only when you file. TurboTax coaches you every step of the way and automatically double-checks as you go, so you can be confident your taxes are done right. Join the millions who file taxes with the TurboTax mobile app – free to file for simple tax returns1. 

KEY FEATURES
• $0 Fed. $0 State. $0 to File your simple tax returns. 
• Start for free - pay only when you file your tax return or pay for TurboTax using your federal tax refund. Fees apply.2
• Connect online with Real CPAs or EAs for unlimited tax advice and even a line-by-line review, so you can be 100% confident it's done right.
• Maximum Refund Guaranteed - On Average $3,284
• Get your taxes done right anytime from anywhere. Seamlessly switch between any device and securely pick up right where you left off when it's convenient for you.
• Snap. Tap. Done. Driver’s License or State ID scan + W-2 Snap and Autofill + 1099-MISC
• Up to a 50% head start on your taxes with year-over-year data transfer of your prior TurboTax return
• CompleteCheck™ – Get the green light to file. Before you file, CompleteCheck™ will run an in-depth scan of your return and guide you through any final changes so you don’t miss a thing with accuracy guaranteed.
• Push notifications - We'll make it easy to stay informed about your e-file return status with notifications sent straight to your phone or tablet
• Face ID, Touch ID and Passcode - Get secure access on your mobile device using the latest technology.

See full disclosure and disclaimers here: https://turbotax.intuit.com/corp/mobile-apps/turbotax-disclosures/
1TurboTax Free Guarantee – $0 Federal + $0 State + $0 To File offer is available for simple tax returns with TurboTax Free Edition; offer may change or end at any time without notice. A simple tax return is Form 1040 only, without schedules 1, 2, or 3.
2TurboTax pricing is based on your tax situation and varies by product. Actual prices are determined at the time of print or e-file and are subject to change without notice. Special discount offers may not be valid for mobile in-app purchases.

Offer details and disclosures for Refund Advance program, visit:  https://turbotax.intuit.com/refund-advance/

Learn how Intuit protects your privacy, visit: https://security.intuit.com/privacy

You've got your March-ing orders, get your taxes done today! This release fixes a crash that some customers saw in the help area

Also new this year:

Any feedback, please visit: https://appfeedback.prod.ttu.a.intuit.com/
comments: I used Turbo tax for the very first time i done my taxes by myself. It was a little harder that i expected but i got it done. Having to wait now because i didnt print them off right away ( i used my cellphone to file instead of computer) , it said it needed some kind of attached voucher when i printed it off. I ended up calling DOR and they gave me a number to put in the memo. Still waiting for my return and that means still waiting to purchase diff vehicle.... :((

The app cost $150 for what I can get everywhere else for less than $20. Plus the app has become cumbersome and deceptive, with adds after every section. I used TurboTax for years but no more. The response I got was a form response and doesn't remove any fees. In fact it only highlighted their deceptive fee practices. I want to be clear that the service I required that took my bill to $150 was the form for my student loan repayment. I used another service and it was free.

I would gladly recommend TurboTax, but not the app. This year I used the app instead of filing on a computer like I normally do. I was not happy with the app. It made the experience much more stressful by randomly saving and forcing you to go back to the beginning of a section and only to click through everything all over again and to add insult to injury, it repeatedly throws an upgrade for some Max service each time it makes you restart. I'll keep using TurboTax, but just not the app.

The real free version is hidden! If you make less then like 60k, you qualify for a truly free version. The app will ask you pay (and not show the IRS free file option) if you have one of the many pretty common tax situations. The IRS free file version through tubo tax is through there web interface ONLY and it's far inferior to the app. You can, however, start on the app and when it tells you to pay, you can convert using the web version and continue with the info you already entered.

This is my 4th year using TurboTax and I have no complaints so far! Its Simple, they help you along the way. They double, triple check at times and they are reasonable on prices for filing electronically. This to me is the cherry on top, or strawberry whatever your preference!!! Its much better than those liberty, H&R etc. Places. The convenience alone is worth it. I don't have to travel to file or receive my money. A+

title: Mileage Tracker by MileIQ
description:
The MileIQ business mileage tracker frees you from the pain of manually tracking your miles for taxes or reimbursement. MileIQ is a free mileage tracking app that will automatically log and track miles, and calculate the value of your drives for taxes or reimbursements. Maximize your tax deductions and reimbursements with MileIQ, the easiest way to keep a mileage log. 

Our mileage tracker helps you easily organize your drives for your business expenses and tax refunds. MileIQ sorts your drives, keeping business miles separate from personal ones, which makes it simple to have a mileage log that will be accepted by the IRS or your business. 

Track miles accurately and quickly get the reports you need to maximize your tax deductions and reimbursements without the administrative struggles. MileIQ is trusted by millions of users who have potentially claimed billions on their tax returns. 

MileIQ automatically tracks every mile you drive in the background. MileIQ means you won’t have to manually log your miles or even manually start and stop recording — just drive like you normally would and MileIQ will create a compliant mileage log for you. Say goodbye to the messy paperwork. 

MileIQ uses smart Drive Detection technology to automatically track miles. It then logs those trips for you and will calculate the drive values for your business and personal drives. 

Log miles from every drive easily and accurately with MileIQ, the most-trusted mileage tracker app!

MileIQ Features:

Mileage Log - Track Miles & Automatically Create Mile Logs
- Mileage tracker records all trips accurately, down to fractions of a mile
- Track drives and categorize them with a swipe—swipe right for business drives and left for personal drives 
- GPS-powered Drive Detection technology captures every mile driven and logs them automatically—don’t worry about your battery, as it intelligently consumes power
- Mileage reports provide information for the IRS and include details you need for your business expense reports.

Business Expenses Reporting & More 
- Track miles from all your business trips and sales calls for reimbursements
- Expense reports are simple: just export your mileage tracking data or send yourself a spreadsheet with all the info you need
- Self-employed or get a 1099? Write off your miles driven on your Schedule C
- Mileage app provides the 2019 standard IRS mileage rate, which is 58 cents per mile driven for business, 14 cents for charity and 20 cents for medical mileage.

Save Money - Tax Deduction & Budget Help
- Tax deductions are calculated accurately for your largest mileage tax deduction yet
- Track miles to get a large deduction, leading to lower taxes, which leads to more money in your pocket.

This mileage tracker app has helped log over 30 billion miles, saved over 60 million hours from manual logging. $2.5 billion in mileage deductions and reimbursements. 

Track your miles and join millions of drivers who’ve saved billions by using MileIQ today!

For a complete record of all your drives upgrade to MileIQ Premium for only $5.99/month recurring or $59.99/year recurring.

Mileage Logging that Works

Easy – Simple to install and use 
Automatic – No stopping and starting the app 
Organized – Classify your drives with a swipe 
Accurate – Mileage logs that meet IRS mileage deduction standards

Download MileIQ by Microsoft for free today!

recentChanges:
New MileIQ features to free you from administrative chores and make working on-the-go easier than ever:

-All Drives: review and edit every drive from the app. You can even edit multiple drives at once.
-Round Trips: drives with the same start and end location are grouped together for quick classification.
-Named Locations manager: add, edit or delete Named Locations from a list in the app.
comments: Great app when it works. But it has bugs. When something goes wrong they have no idea hiw to fix it. I actually had customer service tell me to turn detection off. SERIOUSLY. The canned response to this review was not helpful. I emailed three times, called and nothing. Again, great app when it works. But when it doesn't you can't get much help.

App works well, unfortunately it's not terribly accurate for me. It doesn't offer any controls for when to trigger automated tracking. This means if I'm a passenger in another car, it's creating logs that have to be edited or deleted. I wish they would add the ability to trigger automated tracking when the device connects to Bluetooth. This would give me the ability to more accurately track miles when I'm actually driving my vehicle.

Does not allow you toggle off auto drive detection without constantly giving a notification and attempting to "open a chat" if you. The reason this is annoying is the app will constantly try and update your location causing other apps to fail even when you aren't moving. It's also useless for uber since it mixes half your rides together into blobs of random drives. This app needs some work. If you dont drive much this app will work for you fine. Kinda defeats the point though right?

Used to be great, but the past several months, it has trouble detecting my drives so I miss a lot. A competitors app does not have that problem. I reinstalled and followed instructions on fixing this but it doesn't work. Until this is fixed, I won't be subscribing anymore.

This mileage tracker is perfect for small businesses that have travel expenses. I have had this for over 2 years and absolutely swear by it. Sometimes I have to add drives but very rarely. Usually it's because my phone was rebooting or an update shut off my settings. Not often enough to be a bother. I highly recommend for business with travel.

title: QuickBooks Self-Employed:Mileage Tracker and Taxes
description:
Are you self-employed, a freelancer or an independent contractor? Organize your finances with QuickBooks Self-Employed and let us help you find your tax deductions & returns in time for tax season!. Put more money in your pocket during IRS tax season with this convenient mile tracker, expense tracker, invoice generator and tax deductions estimator. Become a tax pro with easy-to-use online services. 

QuickBooks Self-Employed users have found billions in potential tax deductions by automatically tracking mileage for work. Save receipts and attach them to business expenses, send  invoices and categorize business expenses apart from your personal finances. Get all the tax refunds a self-employed business owner is entitled to! 

Track Mileage Automatically!.
•  Mileage tracking automatically works using your phone’s GPS, without draining your phone’s battery.
• Trip mileage is saved and categorized to maximize mileage tax deductions.

Scan Receipts
• Receipt scanner enters transaction information & can easily save receipts.
• Business expenses are automatically matched and categorized – saving you time and maximizing your tax refunds so that you are ready for IRS tax time.

Expense Tracker to Organize Business Expenses
• Self -employed, freelancer or small business owner – manage business finances easily and keep up to date so you do not miss out on any tax deductions.  
• Import business expenses directly from your bank account.

Get Paid Faster
• Create invoices and send invoices easily on the go. 
• Enable payments and bank transfer services to get paid faster.
• Invoice generator – get notified when invoices are sent, paid, and money is deposited!

Stay Prepared For Tax Time
• We take care of your bookkeeping so you can avoid year-end surprises 
• Easily organize income and business expenses for instant tax filing
• Directly export Schedule C income and expenses.
• Instantly export your financial data to TurboTax Self-Employed by upgrading to the Tax bundle*.

*Users will receive one state and one federal tax return filing.

Purchased TurboTax Self-Employed? Activate QuickBooks Self-Employed today at no extra cost

Already have QuickBooks Self-Employed on the web? The mobile app is FREE with your subscription, and data syncs automatically across devices. Just download, sign in, and go! 

Price, availability and features may vary by location. Subscriptions will be charged to your credit card through your account. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Manage your subscriptions in Account Settings after purchase. QuickBooks Self-Employed is from Intuit, the maker of TurboTax, QuickBooks, and Mint. 

To learn how Intuit protects your privacy, please visit http://security.intuit.com/privacy
*Based on QuickBooks Self-Employed users who have identified less than $100k in deductions
*Based on TY15 subscribers that have identified >$0 in business expenses and of those users that have >$0 in tax savings

 *Getting paid 2X faster based on U.S. customers using QuickBooks Online invoice tracking & payment features from August 2016 to July 2017

recentChanges: Bug fixes and performance improvements to help you make the most of QuickBooks Self-Employed.
comments: I have been using QuickBooks for a year now, it is ok , you can follow your expenses and have all organised when the app is working properly. In my case, recently the transaction function does not record all data from my bank for the last month , is the second time this happens. Also they make it so difficult to get human help , I have to spend half an hour goin through the AI questions to get the help I need. Not really reliable when you have to check expenses continuously.

If you get a new phone you start from ZERO . Unlike other receipt keepers. That's super problematic and makes this make all effectively useless. Glad I changed phones earlier in the year rather than later when I may have had months of receipts to try to categorize. Pass on this app until it figures out a way to be able to transfer business rules, receipt saving and etc across multiple phones for a single email/account

Today my phone (android) has installed the latest update as promissed. Problem is... it has changed all my "milleage" tab km to miles on my phone. ALL my logged km have automagically converted to miles eventhough it still shows in km. I cannot even, with some certainty, tell if the conversion is even accurately due to not having a back up log. What's going on with you guys?

I would not suggest this paid app. If I could get my money back I would. The software kept increasing my expected tax payments every time I modified transactions to the point that my expected payment was 3 times my actual income. Pretty poor functionality for the most fundamental of purposes for this app.

Update 3/10/2020 Wish I could get a refund. Customer service is non existent. The assistance they claim to provide me is the same as my last complaint. App is currently not accepting mileage updates when I select personal or business. App still shows wrong bank account information. They still deposit funds into the wrong account and have zero ways of changing the default account, or at least they've not provided me a means to change accounts. They also like to bombard you with TurboTax spam.

title: EveryDollar: Budget Tool and Expense Tracker
description:
You need a tool that makes it easy to budget on the go. Because life is hectic—but budgeting shouldn’t be. 

Now you can easily manage your money with EveryDollar! Create a custom monthly budget to save money, pay off debt, build wealth, and give. Recommended by top personal money management expert Dave Ramsey, EveryDollar uses the zero-based budget approach that millions are already using to win with money. 

All new users receive a FREE trial of EveryDollar Plus, the premium version of EveryDollar! Access your trial and upgrade to EveryDollar Plus from the main menu. 

Whether you’re new to budgeting or a personal finance expert, you’ll love the simplicity and the power behind this personal budget app!

EveryDollar Free Features
Create Your Personal Budget: 
✔Create the best budget and fully customize it in minutes. 

✔ Access your budget through the mobile app or desktop browser. 

✔ Budget lines, spending, debt payments, notes, and more can be adjusted throughout the month. 


Monthly Expense Tracker: 
✔Manage money and track spending on the go. 

✔EveryDollar lets you split transactions across multiple budget lines. 

✔The spending tracker shows what you’ve spent and what’s remaining for the month. 


Connect with Money Management Experts:
✔Get financial planning with access to our HUGE Endorsed Local Providers program.

✔This personal budget app can connect you with real estate, insurance, and tax professionals.

✔No third-party advertisements that get in the way of your learning. 


Exclusive EveryDollar Plus Features:
✔Connect app to your bank to import transactions to quickly track spending.

✔Manage money and check account balances for connected financial accounts.

✔Gain priority support with our amazing customer success team. 

✔ Set up notifications when you have new transactions ready to track. 

✔ Score access to Financial Peace University—the class that starts you on your journey to never worry about money again and includes Debt Snowball Tool, Emergency Fund Tracker, Mortgage Calculator, Investment Calculator, and more (annual plan only). 
 

Upgrade to EveryDollar Plus from the main menu with In-App Purchases. 

Create a personal budget to stay on top of your finances. Start tracking expenses, paying off debt, and putting more into your savings each month with EveryDollar. 

Budgeting just got easy. Download now and manage money better with your personal monthly budget app. 


Privacy Policy: https://everydollar.com/privacy 

Terms of Use: https://everydollar.com/terms

recentChanges: - Minor background improvements.
comments: Not good on my Samsung Galaxy Tablet. The app seems really useful and helpful. I was able to install on my tablet, open an account easily, and plug in the preliminary budget numbers no problem. I was really enjoying it until I closed and reopend the app (on my tablet) and now I cannot get it to open. I sign in and it goes right back to the sign in page. Frustrating.

It's a good app. A little hard to navigate and could benefit from some kind of AI to walk you through the initial set up and maybe stick with you a few months to get you completely lined out. Then maybe greet you again periodically to let you know about updates and give you some tips. Also the plus version is too expensive in my opinion just to link bank accounts and drag and drop feature mostly. Anyway it's what I am using at the moment to supplement my pen and paper budget.

Waste of money. It worked seamlessly for the first month and now it does not sync with my bank unless i sign out, uninstall the app, sign back in, and put in a new security code every time. And now this week, even that doesnt work. The app freezes and stops working. Ive emailed the Ramsey solutions people and they flat out refuse to refund me my money. Update: Still a waste of money! Now my transactions sync again but 3x per one! So I get to manually delete 2/3 of the transactions! Yay me!

Absolutely LOVE Every dollar! I feel so much more in control of my budget. I can easily see where I was spending more money in certain categories than I was aware. I recommend this to everyone of my family and friends whenever the subject of money comes up.

I've been using this off and on to track my budget which helped, but I've never really followed it and didn't enjoy manually entering expenses. I recently upgraded to the plus version which links your bank account. This has been magical! I'm now staying on budget and can look at what is remaining in each category wherever I am. Thankful for this app since it has kept me on track for paying off debt!

title: Experian - Free Credit Report & FICO® Score
description:
Get your FREE Experian Credit Report & FICO® Score* – anytime, anywhere! Checking your own report doesn’t hurt your credit, and there’s no credit card required. And now, for the first time, you can raise your FICO Score instantly with Experian Boost™. You’ll get the extra credit you deserve with the utility and cell phone bills you’re already paying.

See what's helping or hurting your FICO® Score, learn how your credit report impacts your score and interact with your credit in a completely re-imagined way. Always be in the know with credit monitoring and alerts that notify you when key changes to your Experian Credit Report & FICO Score occur.

Plus, take advantage of Experian CreditMatch™ to find better credit cards and apply with confidence thanks to matches based on your FICO® Score.

KEY FEATURES:

FREE FICO® SCORE*^
• Track your FICO Score and see which financial behaviors are helping or hurting.
• Automatically updates every 30 days upon sign-in.

FREE CREDIT REPORT
• Better understand the kind of information lenders see – like credit accounts, inquiries and public records.
• Automatically updates every 30 days upon sign-in.

EXPERIAN BOOST**
• Connect your accounts to increase your FICO® Score instantly. 
• Look better to lenders and save money by qualifying for better rates and offers.

 EXPERIAN CREDITMATCH***
• See credit card matches based on your FICO® Score.
• Compare your best options and make your choice.

CREDIT MONITORING & ALERTS
• now when your FICO® Score changes, new accounts are opened in your name or new inquiries appear on your credit report.
• Push notifications send alerts directly to your device.
 
CREDIT AT-A-GLANCE
• Easily see a breakdown of your accounts.
• Use the Credit Summary wheel to see the five key elements that make up your FICO® Score.


ABOUT EXPERIAN
Experian is the first company and credit bureau to offer online credit reporting services in the U.S. We’re now the leading provider of credit data and services with credit information on approximately 220 million U.S. consumers and more than 1.5 petabytes of data. We empower consumers to manage and improve their financial status, while helping protect against fraud and identity theft. Experian is deeply committed to educating consumers through financial literacy and funding programs, working with non-profit and public education leaders across the country.

Privacy Policy: https://usa.experian.com/login/#/publicPrivacyPolicy
Terms & Conditions: https://usa.experian.com/login/#/publicTermsAndConditionsFree

*Credit score calculated based on FICO® Score 8 model. Your lender or insurer may use a different FICO Score than FICO Score 8 or another type of credit score altogether. To learn more please visit: https://www.experian.com

**Results may vary. Some may not see improved scores or approval odds. Not all lenders use Experian credit files, and not all lenders use scores impacted by Experian Boost.

***Offers are not available in all states. To learn more please visit: https://www.creditmatch.com

comments: It's OK except that every single time you log in online it shows a page where you can sign up to become a paying member and how great a service it would be to be fully protected from scammers and such. The service they offer is minimal and it sends an email when it detects a change in your credit. The FICO score and Credit Report are free so it's not that bad. The app just takes up extra space on your phone and that page (very annoying) still shows up. They should include it in the menu.

I did what this app told me to do. It says I don't have enough credit history and i look risky to lenders. You need 5 credit card types .then it picked out what was best matched for me with my score and how i spend already etc ,etc.. I was denied on the first 2 and my score just dropped 18 points immediately. I didn't even bother trying anymore. I didnt even want too in the first place but was told this would help me out. Yeah right.

I keep having sign in problems. I have had to change my password 3 times. I changed it last night. Got in fine a minute ago, when to log back in after closing out and it's not accepting the SAME password. I have even tried all my other passwords just in case and retyped the known password 3 times. I'm getting very frustrated with this app. I didn't pay 20 bucks a month for a service I can't use.

Since last app update, cannot log in, at all. Password text box won't even accept the cursor. Update 3/17/20: you did it, again! Broke the app. Nothing on the login screen is clickable. Un/reinstalling the app does NOT fix it. 😡 Yes, I already emailed you at the address, below. Still awaiting a reply... Oh, good! Glad to hear you are working on a solution.

How long is the website/App going to keep having "technical" issues? For the past 3 weeks I have been trying to verify bills on my account to boost my credit score, but every time I do it; all I get is  "Uh oh…We had an issue connecting. The team is looking into it. Please try again later" I may have to uninstall from my phone if it continues like this

title: Truebill Budget Planner, Bill Tracker and Reminder
description:
TRACK EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE
Truebill, the most convenient and big picture personal finance tracker, budget planner and bill reminder app.

Bill tracker app, Truebill’s user friendly interface lets you seamlessly track everything from expenses & spending to upcoming bills  - all while putting money back into your pocket! The budget planner and bill reminder keep track so you don’t have to.  

OVER A MILLION USERS TRUST TRUEBILL?
◉ NBC: This Startup Is Helping People Find Forgotten Money

◉ CNN: How To Shave Hundreds Off Your Credit Card Bill

◉ Fortune: There’s Now A Startup To Help You Cancel All Those Subscriptions

◉ TechCrunch: Truebill Wants To Help You Manage Your Online Subscriptions

◉ Chicago Tribune: 15-Minute Fixes For Your Family’s Finances

THE BUDGET PLANNER AND BILL REMINDER
Truebill, a budget planner and bill reminder app, evaluates your financial standing holistically, giving you a personal finance tracker & bill tracker app that balances automation and customization to make money saving as easy as possible.

Truebill is free to use and offers a wide array of tools all on one simple platform. Save money by managing your subscriptions and bills. Truebill, monthly bill organizer, will automatically detect and manage subscriptions, helping you to keep track of everything --even the ones you may have forgotten about! 

Truebill is a budget planner and bill reminder you can trust!

 THE BILL TRACKER THAT ACTUALLY HELPS YOU SAVE MONEY
Log-in to easily view your monthly bill organizer to stay on top of subscriptions, enjoy easy cancellation and bill negotiations handled by Truebill on your behalf. Having a personal finance tracker in your pocket to manage bills will put an end to late fees and overdraft charges.

Join the thousands using Truebill, expense tracker & spending tracker app to feel confident and in control of your finances. Users see savings of $512 per year by using the budget planner to track spending, manage subscriptions & lower bills. You can even receive credits for things like internet outages - automatically by using this simple expense tracker and spending tracker app.

Examples of how Truebill will save money automatically:

✓ Negotiating the best rates on cable, internet, and cell phone bills
✓ Getting you credits for service outages you may not even know about
✓ Manage subscriptions, cancel unwanted subscriptions, and keep track of recurring bills
✓ Track and manage bills with our monthly bill organizer
✓ Get bank fees refunded, automatically

 MANAGE BILLS & SUBSCRIPTIONS TOGETHER
Bill tracker app, Truebill, is easy to use and your next step towards taking back time and money lost on managing subscriptions, tracking expenses, spending, and budget planning. Truebill expense tracker is your free personal financial tracker and the only app designed to put money back into your pocket.

Truebill is an intuitive monthly bill organizer & bill tracker app created to save money automatically. Our proactive spending tracker & expense tracker tool highlights trends and subscriptions, keeping you in the loop with alerts from the budget planner.

Download our amazing spending tracker &  bill tracker app today and enjoy the best personal finance tracker in the play store!

By downloading and using Truebill, you agree to our current Terms of Use (truebill.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (truebill.com/privacy).

recentChanges: We've added a bills toggle to your spending tab so you can see your spending pie chart without bills (which often eat up too much of the pie!). We've also fixed some bugs.
comments: Amazing! This app helps me better my spending habit with little to no effort. Its not amazing at automatically categorizing your purchases but pretty good. The app automatically sets a budget for each category on an average of your spending for that category but you can lower or raise them if u want. It will notify u when your getting close to your budget limit. Splendid!
Excellent app. Helps to show how I can save more and renegotiates bills with companies like cable to lower your bill. So you don't have to renegotiate it yourself.
For someone using this app for about 2 weeks now, I think this is amazing to see were your money is going the most which can help you plan better and save more. Great job Truebill
Failure to receive code. Despite many attempts to receive the message that's supposed to be sent to my number, none have succeeded. I assure that the correct information is being put in.
Having the same issue as others have posted before. Oneplus 7 pro. Formatting issues. Text cut off. Words missing. Letters cut off.

title: Hurdlr: Mileage, Expense & Tax Tracker
description:
Are you self-employed, an independent contractor or agent? Do you freelance, have a gig, or drive for Uber or Lyft? Save thousands of dollars on your 2018 taxes with Hurdlr’s business expenses and mileage tracker. Plus, easily capture receipts and create expense reports.

Hurdlr connects with thousands of leading banks as well as Uber, FreshBooks, Square, Stripe, and Paypal to import your income and expenses automatically for easy income tax calculations.

You’re one step away from throwing away your shoebox of receipts and mileage logs.

Hurdlr's free version offers more than mileage-only alternative apps by including expense, income tax, and semi-automatic mileage tracking. Our premium version has more robust automation features and is half the price of alternative self-employed accounting apps.

Hurdlr also has a detailed business tax tracker for 2018 quarterly tax accounting.

HURDLR IS PERFECT FOR 1099:
⇢ Independent Contractors
⇢ Uber & Lyft Drivers
⇢ Freelancers
⇢ Small Business Owners
⇢ Self-Employed Entrepreneurs
⇢ Postmates Couriers
⇢ Airbnb Hosts
⇢ Real Estate Agents

AUTOMATIC MILEAGE TRACKER
Hurdlr’s IRS mileage tracking helps 1099’s claim maximum tax deductions. Let Hurdlr track mileage for work, and deduct 58 cents for every mile you drive. Perfect for Uber drivers, Lyft drivers, and other mobile independent contractors.

AUTO-TRACK EXPENSES & IDENTIFY TAX DEDUCTIONS
Connect with over 9,500 banks to auto-track business expenses and identify valuable 1099 tax deductions for independent contractors and small business owners. 

Export detailed expense reports with receipts and send them to any email address or to your tax preparer.

SELF-EMPLOYED TAX ACCOUNTING
See your complete state, federal, and self employed business tax calculator breakdown. Hurdlr provides real-time year end and quarterly tax estimates for independent contractors at the tap of a button. Watch as your business expenses and IRS mileage tax deductions lower your 1099 taxes saving you thousands of dollars.

INCOME TRACKER
Hurdlr connects with Uber, Square, FreshBooks, Stripe, Paypal and thousands of banks to notify you when you get paid as an Uber driver, Lyft driver, freelancer, Realtor, Postmates courier, Airbnb host, or any other independent contractor so you know how much money you’re making. Hurdlr is a receipt tracker, business tax calculator and small business mileage tracker in one simple app.

OPTIMIZED FOR LOW BATTERY USAGE
Because you’re on the road a lot, we’ve designed Hurdlr to work without draining your battery, even with heavy usage.

BUILT BY SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS LIKE YOU
Our team of experienced entrepreneurs worked closely with users like you to build the ideal business  expense, income tax and IRS mileage log, so you can focus on doing the work you love.

CONTACT US
We strive to provide the best customer support, answering all of your questions 1-on-1. Talk to us live, directly from within Hurdlr.

LOOKING FOR OTHER CONTACT METHODS?
• Email us: hello@hurdlr.com 
• Facebook us: http://www.facebook.com/hurdlr
• Website support: https://hurdlr.com

HURDLR PREMIUM
• $7.99 a month or $59.99 a year (Save 37%).
• Premium Features:
  • Auto-Mileage Tracking
  • Auto-Expense Tracking
  • Auto-Income Tracking
  • Real-Time Tax Calculations 
  • Speed Tagging
  • Work Hours
• BONUS: Hurdlr Premium can be deducted as a business expense when you file taxes.

MORE INFORMATION
Learn about our privacy policy at https://hurdlr.com/privacy
Understand our terms of use at https://hurdlr.com/terms

recentChanges:
• Machine Learning finds expenses that you can deduct for your specific business

comments: After trial: I didn't like that I was forced to use the trial after declining the initial offer. I wanted to look through the app and properly set it up beforehand. Once the trial ran out the milage tracker just about last all functionality. Turned on tracking and went for a trip but it stopped tracking once I stopped. It's like it's programmed to be inconvenient in order to "encourage" users to pay for the subscription. I think it's a fairly good app, *if* you have a subscription. Otherwise no.

I bought an annual subscription thinking this app was going to be so helpful in tracking my business mileage and expenses. Big mistake! I have experienced so many bugs and issues with the mileage tracking (having a trip broken into 20 small segments of the trip), not recording all of my trips and having to manually go back and find which trips recorded and which did not. I spend more time double checking Hurdlr records than it would take to manually track the info!

I manage a handful of entrepreneurial endeavors, using slightly fewer bank accounts than I might like. The ability to automatically import, set rules for, and quickly adjust transactions has made reconciliations many times easier. That the mobile app has most of the functionality of the web one, and let's you log time as well as mileage, is an excellent boon. That said, there are times where the categorizations are frustratingly limited or inaccurate , and there's no time tracking widget.

I LOVE this app. The automatic mileage tracker ensures i never miss a deduction and i love the integration of my income and expenses as well. The app is so smart and has figured out that some places I have expenses are always for a certain business so I don't even have to designate them anymore! A must-have for any small business owner or independent contractor, especially if you travel a lot.

I like the features. It can be linked to a checking account then gives prompts whenever a transaction occurs to lable and categorize it. Remembers recurring expenses. Can be set up to categorize multiple businesses to separate income and expenses for each. I haven't used the mileage tracker as efficiently as it probably could be used. The expense and income tracking and year end reports make it worth it for me.

title: Wallet - Money, Budget, Finance & Expense Tracker
description:
Become your own finance manager with Wallet—  a spending tracker and personal finance planner that helps you save money and plan your budgets.  Wallet is not just an expense tracker or budgeting app.  It’s about getting things under control now so that you can make wiser decisions and plan for the future⁠— whether that’s a month, a year, or a decade down the line.

Looking for an app to manage business finance? Check out Board by BudgetBakers! Simply scroll to the bottom of the store listing and you'll find it in More by BudgetBakers.
 
WHY YOU SHOULD USE WALLET
 
Toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time. Tracking your expenses just got easier. Keep full control with beautifully designed reports on your accounts. 

You can easily control your spending and save more using the finance tracker and planner.
 
Wallet is a money manager and budget planner designed to help you from day one.  With continuous insights, you’re able to stay in control of your personal finance for the long-term. 
 
WHAT MAKES WALLET UNIQUE:
 
Automatic Bank Updates - Transactions are automatically and securely synced with your bank, then smartly categorized and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you’ll save loads of time not having to track every penny.
 
Imports or Manual Bank Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets.
 
Flexible Budgets - Budgets help you plan your spending & save money for the future thanks to the integrated money manager. Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances.
 
Insightful reports - Easy-to-understand graphs and financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across bank accounts, credit and debit cards, debts and cash. You can get your income & expense report.
 
Sharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Everyone can contribute from any platform, whether it be Android, iPhone or the Web.


Other features: Multiple currency support, Automatic cloud sync, Receipt and warranty tracking, Categories and templates, geo-mapping transactions, hash-tagging, Shopping lists, Exports to CSV/XLS/PDF, debt management, PIN security, Standing orders, notifications, reports and more.

With Wallet, you can expect updates with new features and improvements routinely.
 
 
HOW TO START USING WALLET
1. Download the app
2. Create Account
3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a master!
  
Wallet is certified with eTrust

comments: 2 major flaws... I would never pay $55 to unlock features to an app, much less one that wont even let us view ALL records within an account. All there is is 30 days, weekly, monthly, yearly and that's it. I mean.. no ALL option?!?! Really?!?! That's as simple as they come UPDATE* I emailed them and they responded with "we are a non technical support team" regardless if I could find a calendar view.. previous dates is not what I'm looking for... I want to see all data in an account.

In the beginning I was amazed by the functions and graphics and planned to pay unlimited license, but trial changed my mind. The main issue is that sync with bank account happens only manually and takes several minutes :O next, the payments are not categorised well. I can't believe that even payments from global chains or popular shops are not recognized. For example Rohlik.cz always falls in Electronics. After all I need to make a lot of manual corrections and it makes tracking unpleasant. Update: The machine learning, never learns. I would prefer if you apply simple list of shops and categories to fancy machine learning if you don't know how to make it work.+ Banks sometimes don't connect for weeks and nobody repairs this until customer notice. I will definitively not continue with this *** another year. Thanks

Decent enough free version, though there are a few problems. The biggest one for me is that the "balance forecast" appears to be counting my planned payments as positives instead of negatives - i.e. my landlord is paying me rent instead of the other way around. As a result the numbers are so wrong that it's almost comical. I have to use an excel sheet for this instead. There are a couple of things I wish were added too, like being able to separate expenses per day by category in reports.

This is clearly the result of a competent team which cared about user experience. One annoying thing is that I "can't delete record in connected account". I'm tracking a bank account and two credit cards. It calculates all of the expenses from the credit cards twice - once for each purchase on the credit card statement, and then the monthly billing of the bank account as well. There should be a simple way to exclude a transaction from the statistics.

Five unresolved support requests and counting. The latest being that it imports credit card expenses as an income and payments as an expense. I noticed that this is an issue reported on their feedback portal last year already that remains unresolved. On another note, it's almost a week now since 3 of my bank connections stopped working and removed from the list of supported banks within wallet. Not a single response nor acknowledgement from the wallet support team.

title: VectorVest Stock Advisory
description:
Welcome to the VectorVest Stock Advisory app. It puts all the information you need to make faster, smarter, better investing decisions at your fingertips.
VectorVest is the only service that analyzes, sorts and ranks over 8,000 stocks every day for Value, Safety and Timing. It tells you when to buy, what to buy and when to sell.  And, it is the only service that combines the power of fundamental valuation with the insight of technical analysis.  VectorVest provides answers, not just data, for you to analyze on your own.  We do the work.  You reap the profits.  

PROVEN MARKET TIMING 
It’s not just what you buy, it’s when you buy. 

VectorVest’s 30-year history as a leader in the financial industry has resulted in a real-world tested and proven Market Timing System that is unlike any other. Instead of the wild, ratings-driven predictions spouted by “experts,” you get simple and effective, rule-based signals that help you keep your portfolio on the right side of the market.

The Market Timing Gauge gives you an at-a-glance summary that shows you when to buy…and when to stop, while in-depth, expert guidance with a personal touch is delivered by VectorVest’s Market Guidance Daily Video Report.
DYNAMIC STOCK SCREENER
Pick tomorrow’s winners today with the VectorVest Stock Screener! Whether you are conservative and focused on safety and dividend income, or aggressive and crave the action of a volatile stock, we have a screen for you. 

With just one tap, we will instantly scan through thousands of stocks to deliver the best potential picks for your portfolio.

PREMIUM STOCK WATCHLISTS
Where do you turn to find stocks? The internet? TV? Newsletters? 
They usually only cover a handful of stocks and can’t keep up with live, intraday market action.
Now, you have access to a better source.

TRADENOW
Trade directly from the VectorVest Mobile App with TRADENOW. TRADENOW is integrated with Ally Invest, Interactive Brokers and TradeStation in the U.S. and with Questrade in Canada.

EXCLUSIVE STOCK CHARTS
A picture is worth a lot more than words. 

VectorVest’s charts are simple, yet powerful. Display the buy/sell/hold ratings for any stock or add VectorVest’s unique Relative Timing Momentum Indicator to spot potential reversals before they happen.



Available Monthly Subscriptions include:
Free
Premium $19.99 USD


http://www.vectorvest.com/legal-information
http://www.vectorvest.com/privacy-policy

recentChanges:
- Premium users are now able to see the details of the Color Guard right on the Market Overview page!
- New and improved login experience.

Thank you for your feedback!
comments: This is a very good app to monitor what's going on in the market it could be improved in the research to be made more like the computer program if you input what you already have in stocks it's a good way to watch what's going on with your stocks to end your wishlist

Legit app. Gives you a quick break down at a glance of any stock you are looking into. Weather it's undervalued or overvalued. Upside potential meter, running meter, safety. I always check stocks on this app before I make a trade.
I love this app very accurate and user friendly. I recommend it to anyone, it sure makes trading alot easier.
Great app love it....makes trading easier...
I like getting the colorguard updates on my phone instaed of bothering with computer. Great product. 20 year subscriber.

title: Webull: Stocks, Options & ETFs
description:
Zero commission trading. Zero minimum deposit. Free real-time quotes (NASDAQ Last Sale). Enjoy Tech. Enjoy Investing.

Current Promotions*:
1. Get Your Free Stocks
a) Open a Webull brokerage account and receive a free stock valued between $2.5-$250.
b) Deposit ANY amount and receive a 2nd free stock valued between $12-$1400.
c) Refer a friend to join us and get THREE free stocks, each valued between $12-$1400.

2. Transfer Fee Reimbursement
Transfer your brokerage account over to Webull, and we will reimburse your transfer fees, up to $100.
* Currently U.S. citizens only.

Truly Commission Free
- Zero Commission for Stocks, ETFs, and Options
- Zero Contract Fees for Options
- Zero Deposit Minimum for Brokerage and IRAs

Options Trading
- Complimentary Real-time OPRA quotes
- Straddle and List Views for Option Chain

In-depth Analysis Tools
- Powerful Charting Tools
- Webull Charting supports 44 technical indicators, as well as 12 charting tools designed to help you analyze trends and decipher market information.
- Free Real-time Quotes

Voice Commands
- With simple voice prompts such as “buy”, “sell”, or “search”, place orders and look up tickers using only your voice on Webull.

Place Orders Quickly
- Enter “Big Button Mode” to quickly place trades at the push of a button. Access the Price Ladder to get a view of the order book and seamlessly place your orders by tapping on the bids and asks.

Full Extended Hours Trading
- Full pre-market (4:00 AM - 9:30 AM ET) and after hours (4:00 PM - 8:00 PM ET) sessions.

Save for Retirement with an IRA
- Invest fee-free and commission-free. Grow your investments by making tax-deductible contributions and tax-deferred earnings.

Multi-platform Accessibility
- Free, in-depth data and analytics in one customizable application across desktop, web and mobile platforms.

24/7 Online Help
- We offer 24/7 online help to guide you through our multiple platforms and answer all your questions.
- Email: CS@webull.com
- Facebook / Twitter/Instagram: @WebullGlobal
- Reddit: /r/Webull/
- Website: https://www.webull.com

DISCLOSURES
System response and account access time may vary due to a variety of factors, including trading volumes, market conditions, system performance and other factors.

Risk Disclosure: Trading of stocks and all other investment products involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for every investor. The value of stocks may fluctuate and as a result, clients may lose more than their original investment.

No content in the App shall be considered a recommendation or solicitation for the purchase or sale of securities, options or other investment products. All information and data in the App are for reference only and no historical data shall be considered as the basis for judging future trends.

Webull Financial LLC is a member of Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC), which protects securities customers of its members up to $500,000 (including $250,000 for claims for cash). Explanatory brochure available upon request or at www.sipc.org.

Our clearing firm Apex Clearing Corp has purchased an additional insurance policy. The coverage limits provide protection for securities and cash up to an aggregate of $150 million, subject to maximum limits of $37.5 million for any one customer’s securities and $900,000 for any one customer’s cash. Similar to SIPC protection, this additional insurance does not protect against a loss in the market value of securities.

Free trading of stocks refers to $0 commissions for Webull Financial LLC self-directed individual cash or margin brokerage accounts that trade U.S. listed securities via mobile devices or Web. Relevant SEC & FINRA fees may apply.

Check the background of Webull Financial LLC on FINRA's BrokerCheck (https://brokercheck.finra.org/).

summary: Zero Commission Trading. Zero Contract Fees for Options.
developerAddress: 44 Wall Street, Suite 501, New York, NY
recentChanges:
1. You can check your account P&L components for customized date ranges;
2. Bug fixes.
comments: Unfortunately you can't use this to trade in Canada, but this is the most well-made app I've ever used for anything. It's the best way to view stocks. It literally has everything. Super, smooth, clean and looks really good especially dark mode. You can name and create your own watch lists, swipe between them, and follow everything super fast.

Overall app is great for charts across globe. Haven't had a real-time trading experience yet. I would like to suggest in fundamental data, kindly include current imp ratios like - debt to equity (D/E), Price to Sales (P/S), EV to EBITDA, Cash Flow per share, Free cash flow, Price to cash flow ratio, and imp growth rations. Including above mentioned ratios can really help traders, investors in taking informed decisions. Thanks for great app.

This is a fantastic intermediate level trading platform. From a technical analyst style of trading, both the desktop version and app allow for user friendly drawing of trend channels, fibonacci tracements, and a plethora of chart indicators. I recommend this to anyone looking for a fantastic trading platform. This just about has it all, an online chat community, paper trading, margin trading, short selling, options trading, and news relating specifically to the ticker all organized fantastically

This app is a joke. I signed up almost a month ago, somehow it took 2 weeks to process my first deposit, then it bounced back had to pay a fee and fund even more to cover the fee. After $75 later and my deposits finally cleared I was hoping it was the end of it. When I went to place a trade somehow my account still has restrictions. I've tried to contact customer support but everytime I message I get an auto-reply. Horrible experience so far, YouTubers getting pay to promote looks like

Perfect mobile trading app.....almost. The user interface is very well thought out, and quite frankly puts many desktop platforms to shame. The downside is their level 2 premium subscription doesn't appear to show the true level 2 quotes, most of the time, when compared in real time to competitor level 2 quotes.

title: Credit Sesame-Personalized Credit Score Tips
description:
Biggest Update to take your credit to the next level!
IN-DEPTH ANALYSIS of your credit score with interactive graphs
NEW PERSONALIZED INSIGHTS: bite-size actions you can take now  
INTUITIVE CATEGORIZATION of recommendations based on your approval odds.

Get your free credit score, report card and monitoring with Credit Sesame.  Our mission is to empower you to achieve your financial goals. With our credit score app we provide millions of people access to free credit scores and coach you to grow your financial potential. No credit card is required, and checking your score will not impact it.  Start the journey today to improve your credit score.


Here is what you can expect in addition to your monthly updated FREE credit score check:

• Free Credit Report Card - We'll break down your score and show you what's impacting your credit.

• Free Credit Strategy - Once you know where you stand, we'll give you a custom action plan to take control of your credit.

• Free Credit Alerts and Monitoring - Free 24/7 credit monitoring with early identity theft warnings and fraud detection

• My Borrowing Power - Get personalized recommendations for the best credit cards, mortgage rates, and refinance options.

• Free ID Theft Protection - You're always protected with $50,000 in identity theft protection insurance.

• Our Robo Credit technology helps us provide customized, tech-driven recommendations so you can make the most of your finances.

We help you answer questions such as:
-What is my credit score?  
-How can I check my credit score?
-How can I better manage my credit?


1000's+ news mentions, including:

• The Wall Street Journal

• The New York Times

• NBC’s TODAY Show

• CNN Money

• CNBC

To learn more, visit Credit Sesame.

recentChanges: We are always making improvements to Credit Sesame. To make sure you can access the latest analysis and alerts about your credit score, keep your Updates turned on!
comments: So far things are working fairly well with app. Although I find it strange that since I am using the app often,I have been receiving calls from robo-messeges stating my ssn is being "suspended " due to suspicious activity and to call a specific number. I call the number and usually receive a voice recording telling me that the mailbox is full and to try again later. If this is true at all, wouldn't it be posted in all this glorious information that you provide to me?

I highly recommend this app. It's not only free, but more importantly, a great educational tool to teach you how to use credit wisely as well as improve your own credit score. And now offering even more updated financial advice to help you wisely get through the Covid-19 pandemic. Love all the new features! Bravo Credit Sesame! 😊

One of the most reliable Apps you could find out there. Compared to other apps that provide similar services, I wished Credit Sesame could keep track of score updates on a more timely fashion. Other than that, it is reliable, and provides best tips towards a healthy credit score.

Quickly showed me my credit score, and negative mark against that I didn't know of. Quickly matched me to banks that I had the best odds of being approved for line of credit to start building my score again. It's been fast and painless. Great job!

Credit Sesame is very good it helps you put your credit back into place. I have told all my friends and I hope they start checking their credit scores that is why I gave you a 5 stars you guys are awesome.

title: Yahoo Finance
description:
Your #1 finance destination to track the markets and the economy.

Follow the stocks you care about most and get personalized news and alerts. Access real-time stock information and investment updates to stay on top of the market.

Favorite features:
• Track the performance of your personal portfolio
• Follow stocks to get real-time quotes and personalized news
• Discover detailed financial information such as historical financials, ESG ratings, and top holders
• Go beyond stocks and track currencies, bonds, commodities, equities, world indices, and futures
• Compare and evaluate stocks with interactive full screen charts
• Sign in to view and edit your web portfolio on the go

Helpful tips:
• Follow all the stocks you care about by searching for the ticker and tapping the star icon
• Create multiple watchlists to organize the stocks you follow
• Enable notifications for price alerts, breaking news, earnings reports, and more
• Sync your portfolios across devices

About Premium billing:
Want to make the most of Yahoo Finance? Upgrade to a Premium subscription for exclusive tools that help you maximize your profits with confidence.

You can choose to be billed $34.99 monthly or $349.99 annually. Payment will be charged to your iTunes account as soon as you confirm the purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each billing period unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel at any point in your App Store account settings.

summary: Research, invest, trade stocks
recentChanges: We update the app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.
comments: Charts stopped updating about half way through the day. Cost me a few good entry points, but luckily it wasnt the other way around and I didnt lose any money. This was easily a 4 star app at the beginning of the day, but about 1 PM it just stopped automatically updating the charts I was following. Please fix this ASAP!!

In the most recent update, it seems you guys tried to fix the alignment of % change (y-axis) such that it aligns with the leftmost bar. It is still messed up. The 0% aligns with the top of the solid bar and the bottom of the hollow bar. It should be the other way around. Please fix it asap. It is nuisance.

The look of the app changed and got slower, so I updated it . Still looks the same, very slow , almost unusable. ..I use this for several hours per day .I had no problems for years , now this....I would be happy how it was 6 monts ago...fix it please...we all are saying the same thing...I have an android phone f.y.i... Update 3/20/20 updated today, all better, fast, seems as good as it was a while ago....thanks

It's a battery hog. That needs to be fixed. There should be options for lower battery consumption mode. Not everyone needs stock updates every 100 milliseconds when app is running in the background. I am following up for the third time. When is this issue going to be fixed? Why should an app consume 25% battery in 4 minutes of use with background disabled? You have a lot of teams and hoops and loops... but this is insane. Let these go directly to the concerned person and fire the middleman.

New version is great. It got rid of the clunkiness and slowness of the old one. Thanks very much. One bug I noticed is a mention of three new posts for a ticker, when in fact nothing has been posted for that ticker in the last 24 hours.

title: Seeking Alpha: Stock Market News & Analysis
description:
Be the first to know about market moving news and analysis on the stocks you follow.

The Seeking Alpha app gives you access to our:
• Real time, concise news created for rapid reading
• Market moving analysis from investors and industry experts
• Instant alerts of news and analysis on the stocks in your watchlist
• Price quotes and charts for the stocks and indices of your choice
• Personal portfolio that allows you to easily track instruments across our features
• An active community of traders, investors, business leaders, journalists and bloggers
• Earnings reports, transcripts and filings

Join the conversation, gain insight, and achieve your investing goals!

Seeking Alpha is the world’s largest investing community. Powered by the wisdom and diversity of crowdsourcing - millions of passionate investors connect daily to discover and share new investment ideas and strategies, discuss breaking financial news, debate the merits of stocks, and make informed investment decisions. +22 million people use Seeking Alpha every month across multiple platforms. 

Seeking Alpha has unparalleled breadth and depth: from stocks, ETFs and mutual funds to commodities and cryptocurrency, including thousands of stocks (such as small and mid-caps) not analyzed elsewhere. SA writers also dive into personal finance, with suggestions for retirement minded strategies. Written by and for investors, thousands of contributors publish thousands of investing ideas every month. Each investment thesis undergoes a rigorous editorial review, ensuring the highest quality standards. A healthy debate ensues, as trading enthusiasts all over the world discuss and share their own thoughts and ideas.

Seeking Alpha levels the playing field by putting exclusive tools, until now available only to Wall-Street professionals, into the hands of individual investors. Advanced tracking, monitoring, charting, data visualizations, technical and fundamental analysis add clarity and enable informed, data-driven decision-making.

Our brand offers a suite of plans that address specific investing styles and user needs:

BASIC MEMBERSHIP PLAN
Upgrade your Seeking Alpha experience by registering for a free account:
• Get breaking stock news, original and unbiased analysis, earnings and transcripts 
• Receive your favorite authors’ latest articles and investing ideas and strategies 
• Subscribe to your choice of Newsletters: Wall Street Breakfast, Morning Briefing, Investing Ideas, Macro View, Dividends and Income, Energy, ETFs and Portfolio Strategy, SA Tech Stock report, IPO daily, Global Investing, M&A, Financial Advisor Daily
• Follow people and read their StockTalks and Blogs
• Comment on news and articles and join the conversation

PREMIUM (in-app subscription available)
• Unlimited access to 1 million investing ideas and earnings call transcripts (including audio) on thousands of stocks not covered elsewhere
• Seeking Alpha Stock Ratings: from ‘Very Bullish’ to ‘Very Bearish’ 
• Author and article performance metrics: see how each investing idea performed
• Quant Ratings: gauge a stock’s growth, value, profitability, and earnings against its industry peers
• Exclusive, proprietary dividend scores
• Data visualizations: earnings and dividend forecasts

MARKETPLACE (available to existing subscribers)
The Seeking Alpha Marketplace is a diverse directory of services with distinct investment styles and interests. Marketplace offers a curated, VIP experience: direct contact with the service’s leaders, access to exclusive real-time trading and investment ideas, model portfolios, and a market trading room where like-minded members surface and discuss exciting opportunities. 
Marketplace services are provided by experts on dividend investing, aggressive growth, ETFs and portfolio management, technical analysis, options, IPOs, commodities, tech and biotech stocks.

For expedited support and feedback:
android@seekingalpha.com
or
https://feedback.seekingalpha.com

• Receive your favorite authors’ latest articles and investing ideas and strategies
• Subscribe to your choice of Newsletters: Wall Street Breakfast, Morning Briefing, Investing Ideas, Macro View, Dividends and Income, Energy, ETFs and Portfolio Strategy, SA Tech Stock report, IPO daily, Global Investing, M&A, Financial Advisor Daily
• Follow people and read their StockTalks and Blogs
• Comment on news and articles and join the conversation

PREMIUM (in-app subscription available)
• Unlimited access to 1 million investing ideas and earnings call transcripts (including audio) on thousands of stocks not covered elsewhere
• Seeking Alpha Stock Ratings: from ‘Very Bullish’ to ‘Very Bearish’
• Author and article performance metrics: see how each investing idea performed
• Quant Ratings: gauge a stock’s growth, value, profitability, and earnings against its industry peers
• Exclusive, proprietary dividend scores
• Data visualizations: earnings and dividend forecasts

MARKETPLACE (available to existing subscribers)
The Seeking Alpha Marketplace is a diverse directory of services with distinct investment styles and interests. Marketplace offers a curated, VIP experience: direct contact with the service’s leaders, access to exclusive real-time trading and investment ideas, model portfolios, and a market trading room where like-minded members surface and discuss exciting opportunities.
Marketplace services are provided by experts on dividend investing, aggressive growth, ETFs and portfolio management, technical analysis, options, IPOs, commodities, tech and biotech stocks.

For expedited support and feedback:
android@seekingalpha.com
or
https://feedback.seekingalpha.com
summary: Stock market portfolio, financial news, analysis, alerts and real time prices.
recentChanges: Performance improvements and Bug fixes
comments: Great app but the mobile version really needs UI refresh. Using (parentheses) around positive integers in the $ view is really confusing. The inability to Freeze a column and scroll is inefficient and frustrating. I could go on and on. Come on, developers, hire a pro UI design team and time-on-site will skyrocket.

Looks like this would a useful tool for many investors IF the shares you are interested in are listed. None of my shares are listed in the app (all London exchange, so maybe that's why i can't find them). Maybe one of the few worth a subscription, if your shares are listed. I'd suggest the makers of app focus I adding more shares rather than features now.

Well, it's excellent. You set information preferences and priorities. Summaries of the article are provided. Reporting and analysis are excellent. Trump and other ashats have no influence. I very rarely give 5 star ratings because they are very rarely deserved, but, SA is deserving. Compared to other sources of market news, analysis and insight it's the only one deserving, IMHO. Tks Alpha

Lots to like some features to expand. I like the short bullet point overview of each article. The news and info is up to date and timely. I wish I could have a bigger watch list and an easier way to find other articles that might be off topic for me.

Good user interfaces (for reading, contributing is a challenge). Sadly, Quality of content came down, especially comments (much about political views, less relevant investment concent). Contributing an article is a hassle.

title: Stock Market Tracker
description:
Get real-time stock quotes and alerts with Uplift, the best stock market app for Android.

✓ Track US stock markets or international stock markets
✓ Stock market news feed for each stock quote
✓ Stock portfolios for NASDAQ, NYSE, Dow Jones, ETFs, Indices, S&P 500
✓ Stock market live quotes, to monitor your stock portfolio and investments easily

Our stocks tracker pulls in real-time stock market quotes so you're always up-to-date. You can watch stocks and follow market news, view your portfolio, get stock alerts, and follow the major stock exchanges. You can also set stock price notifications, so that when a stock you're watching reaches your target price you'll get a stock price alert.

Top features
★ Real-time stock quotes, easy to track portfolios, and up-to-the-minute data to help you stay on top of the markets. We aim to be the best stock quote app with real-time stocks.

★ Build your own portfolio and monitor your favorite stocks, indexes, mutual funds, and ETFs

★ Set alerts and get push notifications for stocks on your watch list

★ Multiple portfolios to keep track of your stock trading and investments

★ Financial data including open price, close price, daily high/low, 52-week high/low, gain/loss, aftermarket and premarket, end-of-day quote, EPS, P/E ratio, dividend, and dividend yield

★ Stock charts and including daily and intraday charts, plus weekly, monthly, and yearly historical charts

★ Stock market news for tickers listed in US stock markets

★ Advanced features including ROA, ROE, cash flow including FCF and OCF per share, revenue growth, P/B, asset turnover, leverage, stocks tracker, forward P/E, and PEG ratio

Investing and monitoring the financial markets doesn't have to be hard! Whether you're looking to buy, sell, or just keep track of your portfolio, Uplift will help you get stock quotes and stock alerts to react to market news in real time.

Supports thousands of stock tickers and companies to invest in. 

Questions or comments? Let us know: uplifthelp@gmail.com. We aim to be the best stock market app for Android 🚀

summary: Track stocks and get stock quotes, prices, charts, and alerts with this app 🚀
recentChanges: Better notifications and stock alerts so you can track your favorite stocks easier!
comments: Don't know how good this is overall, stopped short and uninstalled due to graphing control. Once you tap into zoom/scroll mode, you can't get back to curser mode. And doesn't have screen rotation or full screen graphs.

Good. Notifications should be removed after first snoozed one. I received a notification after the marked closed, i have closed it and i have received several others... a little bit anoying but i changed the limits and it was ok.

This is a great simple app and I am happy I got the paid version, it would be really great if app would also some visuals on company's revenue and profit over the past several years from their earning calls.

the info in the paid service are not impressive enough. at least it should show the 52 week low price. or even let the user, choose to show 2 year low, 3 year low price, or whatever time span. these are info the info service provider could easily provide. that would save much effort to the end users
It is simple to use. It quick if ur just wanting a update. I like it because I can set a alarm when a price is close to my limit order.

title: Investing.com: Stocks, Finance, Markets & News
description:
Join the millions of people using the Investing.com app every day to stay on top of global financial markets!

Investing.com offers a set of financial informational tools covering a wide variety of global and local financial instruments.

 REAL TIME DATA 
Live quotes and charts for over 100,000 financial instruments, traded on over 70 global exchanges.
Track major global indices, stocks, bonds, commodities, currencies, interest rates, futures and options.

 ECONOMIC CALENDAR 
Live updates on global economic events customized to your personal interests.
Our real time Economic Calendar is used by top traders and investors to track market-moving events as they are announced, making it easy to track market impact.

 PERSONALIZED PORTFOLIO 
Add your favorite financial instruments and their holdings to your portfolio.
Build your own customized watchlist and keep track of stock quotes, commodities, indices, ETFs and bonds - all synced with your Investing.com account. Your personal Watchlist can be accessed anytime from your menu, providing you with real-time prices, and the Holdings Portfolio shows you your total assets value 24/7.

 ALERTS 
Our Alerts system allows you to receive customizable alerts for any instrument, economic event or new analysis articles. For all 100,000 financial instruments, you can set up notifications for a specific price, change by %, or Volume. All pushed by request, and synced with the website.

 NEWS & ANALYSIS 
Breaking news, videos, updates and analysis on global financial markets, as well as technology, politics and business.
Be the first to read the latest on stocks, currencies, commodities, and global economy.


 FINANCIAL TOOLS 
Quick access to all of our world-class tools, including: Economic Calendar, Earnings Calendar, Technical Summary, Currency Converter, Market Quotes, advanced charts and more.

 ALREADY A MEMBER? 
Sign-in and continue where you left off by syncing your portfolio and personal alerts between all of your devices.

 SOCIAL 
Join our growing community of traders and investors and share articles to Facebook, WhatsApp, Twitter, and LinkedIn.

 OUR DATA: 

 COMMODITY PRICES 
Follow up-to-the-second commodity prices, including: Gold, Silver, Copper, Platinum, Crude Oil, Brent Oil and Natural Gas.

 MAJOR STOCKS 
Track stock market leaders: Apple Inc. (AAPL), Alphabet Inc. (GOOGL), Bank of America Corporation (BAC), Tesla (TSLA), General Electric Company (GE), Cisco Systems, Inc. (CSCO), American Express Company (AXP), Amazon (AMZN), Nike (NKE), Microsoft Corporation (MSFT), Netflix (NFLX), and many more.

 GLOBAL INDICES 
Follow data from all major stock market indices, including:
■ U.S: Dow Jones, S&P 500, NYSE, NASDAQ, SmallCap 2000
■ Americas: Merval, Bovespa, RUSSELL 2000, IPC, IPSA
■ Europe: CAC 40, FTSE MIB, IBEX 35, ATX, BEL 20, DAX, BSE Sofia, PX
■ Asia-Pacific: CNX Nifty, Shanghai Stock Exchange Composite Index (SSEC), Hang Seng, KOSPI - and many more.
■ Africa: BSE Domestic Company, Kenya NSE 20, Semdex, Moroccan All Shares, South Africa 40
■ Middle East: Bahrain All Share, EGX 30, Amman SE General, Kuwait Main, TA 35

 RATES BONDS 
Real time data on bonds, including US Yield Bonds, Euro Bund, UK Gilt, Euro BTP and more.

recentChanges:
* Bug fixes
* Performance improvements
comments: I have subscribed the premium from October 2019 and have been charged ever since automatically to the phone bill. But from November 2019, the app return to free version even though I paid it along with the phone bill. This is unacceptable and can be considered a fraud. I demand a refund from November 2019. Update: still not ad free. I want a refund please. Stop this mambo jumbo about technicalities. This is fraud.

Tried to sign up 8 times with email and I never received a confirmation code. Absolutely useless. Just tried again and still won't send confirmation code by email. I did receive an email, but it would take far too long to fill in the information on their support request than it's worth. Absolutely useless with terrible customer support.

Took hours to get the email verification email. The app had a window asking for the verification code in that email. But by then, that window was long gone. No way to enter the code or reset the password or finish the account registration in any way. Do some basic testing before releasing an app. Not worth my time.

Between the full page ads on every load, and the broken premarket and after hours figures that just disappeared recently this is a strong pass. Many other apps out there with more features, less ads and just as fast with market numbers. This is a great example of a decent app, ruined by developer greed. Uninstall

This app kills itself by deploying full screen ads that completely BLOCK the News Article you've clicked onto read. The ad cannot be removed. You must click back to the previous screen to remove the ad. This renders most of the news feed useless. Stupid.

title: Checkbook - Account Tracker
description:
An easy & quick way to manage your daily finances!  Checkbook keeps track of your credit card charges, cash expenditures...etc. With Checkbook application, it can totally replace your paper checkbook register. You can create multiple accounts with start balance, save recurring transactions, transfer funds, view reports & graphs, export data...etc. You can even search the transaction by crossing your finger on the calendar! All details of the Checkbook are well designed to provide excellent experience. 

FEATURES 

*Export your ledger in CSV Format 

*Calendar 
-Show all your monthly transactions as points on the calendar. 
-Track transactions by tapping a date on the calendar. 

*Recurring Transactions 
-Save a transaction to be used repeatedly(daily, weekly, 2 weeks, monthly, tire monthly), without retyping all the details. 

*Multiple Accounts 
-Track as many accounts as you need. 

*Categories 
-Supports multiple categories with beautiful icons to choose from. 

*Payee & Note 
-All details you need to keep track of your transactions are including. 

*Search 
-Quickly search for transactions by account name, payee, notes and category. 
-Search and edit transactions in the same screen. 

*Transfer 
-Transfer funds from one account to another. 

*Reconcile Transactions 
-Reconcile your transactions by editing cleared/un-cleared status 

*Reports & Charts 
-Review all your expense & income by category or account with beautiful graphs and reports. 
-You can set the time period to daily, weekly, monthly & yearly. 

*Passcode 
-Protects your private information. 

*Currency 
-Supports multiple currencies. 

*Elegant, Powerful & User friendly interface 

If your have any problems or suggestions please send a mail to checkbook.a@appxy.com, you will get the response in a short time.

The free version is an ad-supported version, we also offer an ad-free version which is available as in-app purchase. Once you upgrade to the pro version you can backup & restore your data via Google Drive manually. 

Permissions Overview:
1. Storage: Checkbook needs this permission to store backup file in your device
2. Contact: Checkbook needs this permission to read your Google account when you choose to save backup file to your Google Drive

Follow us on Twitter: @Appxy_official
Like us on Facebook: Appxy
Follow us on Google+: Appxy
