recentChanges:
- Minor bug fixes
- Stability improved
comments: Great, til it wasn't. Worked fine for years, then a major update hit overnight, so I woke up this morning to an app that looked totally different. That's not a huge deal, apps change aesthetically and functionally from time to time. The big problem is that all of my accounts show balances that are wildly out sync with reality. One of my accounts had a (correct) balance of a few hundred dollars last night, but now shows over $90,000. Please send help.

This app become such a disappointment and simply unusable after the update. I have been using this app for years and loved it. It was simple, colorful and it allowed for customization. Then the update happened and all 6 of my accounts, some of which had at least a year of date on it are now completely messed up. I have spent time trying to get the accounts correct again but they are so messed up that it would be easier to start over. At first I was just going to delete everything and start over with the app, but after reading the reviews it appears that a lot of users are having issues after the update. Therefore I have decided to uninstall and find something else. It's terrible that such an incredible app is now essentially useless because of an update.

This was the best checkbook app out there. I have used it for years. The update that happened made it unusable. The app crashes everytime I use it and shows all my accounts in the negative by thousands of dollars. I import the dropbox backup and it makes it correct but the next time I open it goes back to the wrong balances. You have to see all your transactions unless you choose to hide cleared transactions everytime. It doesn't save your preferences. I am actively looking for a new app.

Love it. I'm definitely going to pay for this one to get the ads gone lol. not something I normally do for* apps. Edit: I'm not too keen on the new update. It's not all that bad, but it used to automatically set something as Expense or Income as it was saved previously, now I have to select them. Not a big deal but a mild annoyance.

Been using the app for a while now. Helps keep track of all my expenses. I do have one suggestion, when you go to the recurring payment tab I would add a feature that adds everything together so you can go to it to get a quick glance of how much you have going out every month instead of adding them all together yourself. Just something to help save the user a little time

title: Dark Pool App
description:
New to The Stock Whisperer offering, we've created the Dark Pool App. The app itself is free to download. In the App you'll see Stefanie tweeting all day long on the highly unusual trades that will affect specific stocks along with the entire market. You can also subscribe to the Private feed to receive specific levels to watch along with pictures of these trades and charts showing you the highest probability trade set ups. You’ll get notifications when the dark pool is buying and you’ll get notified when they are selling. 
As a Special Bonus you will receive Stefanie's Dark Pool Weekly Whispers  Video (over 90% success rate on stock recommendations.)
NOW Only available on the Private Feed. 
Did you know that over 40% of all the trades being executed right now are being done in this alternative secret exchange known as The Dark Pool? Knowing where the big guys are buying and selling will increase your success rate whether you're a day trader, short term swing trader or longer term investor.

                                                 Our premium feed includes:

Highly unusual Dark Pool prints on Gold, Silver, Oil, Natural Gas, Financials, Technology, 
Energy, Healthcare, Cryptocurrency and so Much More!
Specific levels that Stefanie Kammerman aka The Stock Whisperer is bullish above and bearish below.
Exclusive Feed Straight from The Stock Whisperer's Trading Platform

Dark Pool Weekly Whisper Video and Trade Setups covering all Market Sectors

Download the app today and Be the First to Know!

recentChanges: Version has Pinch zoom on images, bug fixes and new Video of the day link.
comments: Having information is everything in this business. Stefanie works harder than anyone else. The monthly subscription price is an absolute steal.

Look forward to reviewing every morning. Invaluable tool for trading. Great for people who can't be at their desk watching the market action all day. It is also a good learning tool. You learn to understand levels.
All of the whispers are blank. I've unistalled and reinstalled multiple times.

The alerts on here aren't guaranteed to make you money ... they are simply a tool to add to your toolbox. I day trade options and can tell anyone personally, if you follow your trading plan and are disciplined, you will make money on these alerts. To date, I am up 120% just this fiscal year alone (40 days) (thanks TSLA) and up 593% in the past year day trading these alerts. For the small fee this service costs ... it is worth every penny. I look forward to joining the Java Pit very soon!!!!
Trying to buy a subscription but it says item already purchased.

title: DealCheck: Real Estate Calculator & Analysis
description:
DealCheck is the simplest and fastest way to analyze and compare investment properties on your phone or tablet.

Loved by over 100,000 real estate investors and agents, it's ranked Top 5 Real Estate Investing App in over 12 countries, and has been featured by Forbes, BiggerPockets, Jason Hartman and others.

Whether you’re a new investor who wants to learn how to analyze rental properties and flips, or an experienced professional who needs 24/7 access to powerful analysis, projection and reporting tools, you’ll love this real estate calculator.

ANALYZE ANY INVESTMENT PROPERTY
DealCheck will help you crunch the numbers and perform due diligence on any rental property, BRRRR, flip, rehab project, multi-family or commercial building in seconds.

Quickly import property data from public records or enter it through a step-by-step wizard. Our app will calculate a complete analysis of the deal, including closing costs, mortgage payment, cash flow, ROI, profit and more.

You can look up recent sales and rental comps, create and share detailed reports, compare properties against your purchase criteria and perform reverse valuation analysis to determine your highest offer to the seller.

Your data will sync to the cloud and is available on any phone, tablet or computer. You can start your work on one device and continue on another without missing a beat.

ALL-IN-ONE INVESTOR'S TOOLKIT
• Analyze single-family, multi-family and commercial rentals, BRRRR's (buy, rehab, rent, refinance, repeat), Airbnb's, vacation rentals and flips (house flipping)
• Import property description, value & rent estimates and photos from public records and listings
• Manage and itemize closing costs, rehab budgets, holding costs and operating expenses
• View in-depth property analysis, including purchase breakdown, financing, cash flow, profit projections and investment returns
• Calculate the capitalization rate (cap rate), cash on cash return (COC), return on investment (ROI), internal rate of return (IRR), gross rent multiplier (GRM), debt coverage ratio (DCR) and more
• Quickly vary your assumptions and view long term holding projections for rentals and profit projections for flips
• Look up recent sales comps, comparable rental listings and market statistics to help you estimate the after repair value (ARV) and rent
• Customize, export and share professional PDF reports with your personalized branding, contact info and logo
• Find conventional, private money or hard money financing through our investor-friendly lender directory
• Learn about real estate investing with our built-in real estate glossary, complete with explanations and formulas

GET AN EDGE OVER OTHER INVESTORS
Stop relying on complicated Excel spreadsheets or other’s advice and let DealCheck help you find your next real estate investment.

While other real estate investors make mistakes in their analysis, you can be sure that your pro forma calculations and profit projections are 100% accurate, complete and unbiased. 

And with DealCheck's beautiful property reports, you can get your offers accepted faster and impress your lenders, partners or clients.

REGULAR UPDATES & NEW FEATURES
We are committed to keeping this the best real estate calculator for Android and regularly release new features. We'd love to include your suggestion in our next update - send us your ideas to support@dealcheck.io.

Website: https://dealcheck.io
Help Center: http://help.dealcheck.io

Terms of Use: https://dealcheck.io/terms
Privacy Policy: https://dealcheck.io/privacy

You can look up recent sales and rental comps, create and share detailed reports, compare properties against your purchase criteria and perform reverse valuation analysis to determine your highest offer to the seller.

Your data will sync to the cloud and is available on any phone, tablet or computer. You can start your work on one device and continue on another without missing a beat.

ALL-IN-ONE INVESTOR'S TOOLKIT
• Analyze single-family, multi-family and commercial rentals, BRRRR's (buy, rehab, rent, refinance, repeat), Airbnb's, vacation rentals and flips (house flipping)
• Import property description, value & rent estimates and photos from public records and listings
• Manage and itemize closing costs, rehab budgets, holding costs and operating expenses
• View in-depth property analysis, including purchase breakdown, financing, cash flow, profit projections and investment returns
• Calculate the capitalization rate (cap rate), cash on cash return (COC), return on investment (ROI), internal rate of return (IRR), gross rent multiplier (GRM), debt coverage ratio (DCR) and more
• Quickly vary your assumptions and view long term holding projections for rentals and profit projections for flips
• Look up recent sales comps, comparable rental listings and market statistics to help you estimate the after repair value (ARV) and rent
• Customize, export and share professional PDF reports with your personalized branding, contact info and logo
• Find conventional, private money or hard money financing through our investor-friendly lender directory
• Learn about real estate investing with our built-in real estate glossary, complete with explanations and formulas

GET AN EDGE OVER OTHER INVESTORS
Stop relying on complicated Excel spreadsheets or other’s advice and let DealCheck help you find your next real estate investment.

While other real estate investors make mistakes in their analysis, you can be sure that your pro forma calculations and profit projections are 100% accurate, complete and unbiased.

And with DealCheck's beautiful property reports, you can get your offers accepted faster and impress your lenders, partners or clients.

REGULAR UPDATES & NEW FEATURES
We are committed to keeping this the best real estate calculator for Android and regularly release new features. We'd love to include your suggestion in our next update - send us your ideas to support@dealcheck.io.

Website: https://dealcheck.io
Help Center: http://help.dealcheck.io

Terms of Use: https://dealcheck.io/terms
Privacy Policy: https://dealcheck.io/privacy
summary: Quickly analyze and compare investment properties no matter where you are.

comments: I love this app I highly recommend it! You can use it on the web too with the pro account and it makes everything so seamless and professional. Thank you for this app!
Perfect tool to run quick numbers, and option for additional information. Awesome tool
Phenomenal Application, great for beginners and Professional Real Estate Developers 👍🏿👍🏿
Please add the ability to manually enter comps.

They added BRRRR! this app is amazing! Just the stuff you get for free is over the top. Talk about delivering value. They also give you the ability to create very professional PDF presentation documents. Very impressive for free software I highly recommend it.

title: Simplifi: Money Management
description:
Simplifi by Quicken helps you effortlessly manage all of your finances in one place and make your hard-earned money work harder for you.

Simplifi by Quicken makes it easy to customize and track your budget, manage spending, and reach your financial goals with one personalized, use-anywhere app

EASILY ORGANIZE YOUR MONEY
* Automatically connect with and view all financial accounts in one place so you know exactly where you stand.
* Effortlessly identify changes in spending, income, net worth, and more so you know you’re on the right track.

SET & ACHIEVE PERSONALIZED GOALS
Whether you’re saving for your dream home, a vacation, retirement, or your child’s education, Simplifi helps you achieve life’s most important milestones.

TRACK SPENDING & BUDGET WITH CONFIDENCE
* Feel confident that you are covered to spend on the things you care about.
* Create a simple budget based on your income and bills to make sure you aren’t spending more than you make in a month.
* Categorize and monitor spending so you can get and stay ahead.

LEARN KEY SPENDING & SAVING INSIGHTS
* Discover key insights so that you can make decisions that matter to you.
* See how much money you have spent this month, excluding bills and subscriptions, so you know if you can spend or need to cut back.

SECURITY
We’re serious about protecting your account and privacy. Visit https://www.quicken.com/privacy/us to learn more.

PRIVACY
If you are a California resident, please refer to the new privacy guidelines set forth by The California Consumer Privacy Act on information sharing. If you would like to opt-out of the sale of your personal information as defined by these new guidelines, please go to http://www.quicken.com/privacy.

recentChanges: Bug fixes including a fix for scenarios where transactions appeared to be missing.
comments: So far I really like this app. I used Mint for a long time as well as another financial app. The Ads for Mint is so annoying and it's configurable options are limited. The other app had a good UI but a very limited mobile app. Sync with Simplify is seamless and the mobile app is very user friendly. The Web UI makes this a complete financial app. The only part that's lacking is itemization for investments.
This app doubles many of the transactions, making the dashboard a complete nightmare. No easy way to mark duplicates. It's much worse at everything than Mint.
Improving capabilities more and more. Really like the ability to manage recurring bills and income, which helps predict cash flow.

This app could be so good. Lots of potential. It looks great, pretty easy to use. But, There's no customization for the dashboard. I don't want to see my spending year to date I want to see this months spending! It will not let you change anything on the dashboard. Lots of unhelpful information. Plus, my net income is wrong. Idk what is wrong with it but it is missing expenses and all of my accounts are linked to it. A real shame bc the app is very aestheticly pleasing.

This app is very useful, especially if you have lot different banks and saving account to keep track on... im actually was surprise how many useful features, such as making saving goals💵, shows me my top spending graph 😱💸, how to reduce my financial spending and so much more. Plus, the pricing for premium isnt ridiculously expensive, so far its worth it, I really recommend this app.

title: Currency Heatwave FX: Forex trading strength meter
description:
Currency Exchange Forex trading Strength Meter

Currency Heatwave forex trading tools is a financial markets app and forex robot that focuses on the traders who use MT4 Metatrader 4 FX tools and parameters that are important for trading as much as the basic movement of the Forex Exchange Instruments itself. These complex parameters are simplified in a graphical format and heat map to help traders in split decision making on buying or selling currencies.

The currency strength meter app has 5 screens covering 4 important aspects of trading that is Currency Strength, Volume, Volatility and Sentiment.

Home Screen
This screen projects the currency strength meter in an innovative fashion. The live pie chart movements projects currency strength and weakness in one glance. The expanded portion shows strength and the contracted portion shows the weakness. The strongest currency is denoted by the green arrow and the weakest currency is denoted by the red arrow. A perfect dashboard for currency trading FX tools.

Strength Screen
The currency strength indicator screen of Currency Heatwave app shows the strength and weakness of the currencies in meter format. The extreme green is maximum strength and extreme red is the maximum weakness.

Volume Screen
This screen projects the highest to lowest volume of the currencies in cylindrical volume format. The highest and lowest volume denotes the maximum and least contracts traded for the currencies at a particular moment. The green arrow denotes the highest volume from the lot and red arrow denotes the least volume from the lot.

Volatility Screen
This screen of currency strength meter app projects the highest and lowest volatility of the currencies in the Yo-Yo format. The highest and lowest volatility denotes the maximum and least volatility movements for the currencies at a particular moment.The green arrow denotes the highest volume from the lot and red arrow denotes the least volume from the lot. Use currency trading fx tools wisely for maximum gains.

Sentiment Screen
This currency heatwave app screen shows the bullish and bearish sentiment for the particular currency at a particular moment. The bull sentiment more than 50% shows bullish or upward acceleration bias and bear sentiment more than 50% shows bearish or downward acceleration bias.

Take advantage of this smart currency trading foreign exchange tool. Download Currency Heatwave: Forex trading strength meter for FREE!

comments: This app was perfect until the last update. Now it tells you to update the app every time you open it. I've already tried uninstalling and reinstalling but that doesn't work. Kind of want my money back or they need to undo the update. It's kind of annoying having to close and reopen the app a few times before working. Good customer service. Im a programmer myself and know it very well that the live data in the app is maintained very well. Your app price is too good for the product you guys provide. Seen many expensive forex products and strength meters. This one is a gem!!!

the app really a handy tool for my trading. btw, it always ask for update every time i open the app but when i open via Google play it's already updated. I read that need to reinstall back and restart the phone back but still the same thing occurs. Pls advise. thanks. btw, great apps. kudos

For the last month now i keep getting the message to upgrade the app but it keeps reappearing continuously. I even uninstalled the app completely and reinstalled it but i still get the message to update. I'm using sansung s8 plus. Pls check

This is one of the good app i have seen so far about forex(currency) for so long i have been looking for a simple strategy to trade but this is enough for me to trade at any possible time of my choice thank you very much and keep up with the good work guys...😁😁😁

title: Mvelopes Budget App
description:
Easy to Get Started :
Start today by downloading the Mvelopes budget app and use it for free for 30 days, add your financial institutions and come up with a budget that will keep you on the path to financial freedom. You will get all your transactions sent to your Mvelopes account and you will easily be able to track all your account balances in one easy to use app. Mvelopes uses an envelope budgeting method to help you plan and track your household or personal budget. You can assign and manage your budget, as well as receive feedback on where you have spent your money and how much you have remaining
 
• Mvelopes is an A + Rated Business with the Better Business Bureau
• Tool for Tidying Up Your Budget - Credit Karma
• Named best app for “Over Spenders” - Kiplinger’s Personal Finance
• App That Makes Budgeting Fun - WiseBread
• Best Online Money Management Tool - Nasdaq
• Budget App for Recent Graduates - NerdWallet
• Right Tool for Keeping Financial Resolutions - CreditCards.com
• App That Helps Manage Your Student Loans - SoFi
• Budget Tool for the New Year - Chicago Tribune


Get The Most Out Of Your Money 
Use the Mvelopes budget app to help make more informed budgeting decisions and future plans. Track your bank accounts and credit card balances alongside your budget to help pay off your debt and increase savings faster. Create a financial plan for the future and make it happen.
Save time with the Mvelopes budget app and its access to over 16,000 financial institutions, so you can focus on managing finances and not entering transactions. Be secure with in-app security settings, a four-digit PIN or your Mvelopes username and password. 

Mvelopes Features:
• Import your bank and credit card accounts and track your spending within Mvelopes
• Unlimited envelopes and financial institutions can be used in your account 
• Use digital envelope budgeting system to organize and simplify your finances
• Easily access or adjust your budget on the go
• Categorized spending helps you make informed decisions when you shop
• Inbox-style transactions makes it easy to stay on top of your budget every day
• All-in-one accounts screen lets you view your checking, savings and credit card balances in one place
• Assign transactions to envelope categories, including splitting individual transactions into separate categories
• Complete, real-time synchronization with the Mvelopes web app at Mvelopes.com
• Money saving tips, ebooks, and videos inside the app

comments: I am disappointed that this app doesn't not work well enough to charge $40 annually. I have been a customer for 5 years and still can't readily get in touch with customer support. There have been multiple time where the app has synced in correctly, rendering it useless until I get in contact with support. Chat takes several hours. Emails have taken up to a week for a response. Support is an embarrassment and should be expanded. I'm not sure $40 is worth the frustration. Maybe vs 5 will be better

Worst support for a paid service. Canceling my subscription has been a BATTLE since I can't remember my username - can't cancel from the app even if you're logged in (for some reason, even tho I signed up through the app, subs may only be cancelled through the web). Trying to get support to help me find my username has been a mess. I'm now in my 9th hour trying to get through to support. Ticketing system says I'm 54th in line - then 97th. Suddenly 1st, and I miss it for lunch. Just walk away.

This is a scam. I signed up for the 30 day free trial, but you can't actually use your account without fully committing to a subscription and paying them. You can't cancel your account during the 30 day free trial because you do not have access to the account settings that allow you to do that. There is no email contact info for this company anywhere, chat help does not exist. Huge waste of time and now I have to worry that they will charge my credit card without my permission. Good times. 👎

I loved this app before they upgraded and took the main 2 features I used away. The reoccurring transactions and the 2 different balance of my accounts.. current and available. I cancelled the app last year when it happened and haven't found a program since. Thought maybe I'd try this again but those features are the main things I want.. cancelled again but was still charged.. just cancelled again hopefully I wont get charged....

Wouldn't let me create a password so I can't use it... It kept telling me to add special characters, which I did. It still wouldn't accept it Also, it really makes the app seem fishy when the terms of use check box is the same as the email list check box.

title: Investor's Business Daily
description:
Winning stock lists, real-time charts and up-to-the-minute market news: now available everywhere, thanks to the newly enhanced Investor’s Business Daily app. The IBD app is free to download.

IBD Digital members will also have access to their favorite premium features, IBD premium lists, charts and personal stock lists. Not an IBD member? You’ll still be able to keep up with market news, videos and information like you would on investors.com.

The IBD app features:
•	Callouts of recent chart action for stocks on IBD’s proprietary stock lists.
•	Your personal stock lists, now synced across all your devices
•	Access to premium features for all IBD Digital members
•	Exclusive stock lists like IBD 50, Sector Leaders, IPO Leaders and more
•	The latest daily market analysis with The Big Picture and Stock Market Today
•	Customizable stock list on the home screen
•	Personalized news pages with embedded videos to keep you up-to-date on stocks you’re watching
•	Tap stock symbols to see IBD’s exclusive Smart Select Ratings

The IBD app is free to download but IBD Digital subscribers get access to premium ratings and interactive tools. IBD Digital subscription gives you unlimited access to our stock research and analysis across multiple devices—mobile, Mac and PC.

You can purchase a monthly or annual subscription in the IBD app. Both subscriptions come with a one-month free trial and payment will be charged to your Google Play account at the end of the trial period. You may cancel a subscription at any time in your Google Play account settings. Subscriptions auto-renew unless deactivated at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.

If you have any questions about how the app functions or how to access to your subscription on other devices, please contact us at (800) 831-2525 or outside the United States at (310) 448-6600.

comments: Very trustworthy and informative app. Gives you all the statistics and facts up front, and allows you to look for their opinion rather than advertising it. Only reason it's not 5 stars is it's a little difficult to navigate.

When I try logging in clicking the gmail link on the log in page the app crashes every single time and the IBD notifications I do get redirects me to chrome not the actual app. Had these issues since may 2019 without either of these issues being resolved.
So far so good. Lots of information to keep you abreast of whats going on with stocks/markets!
Easy to use and straightforward with good quality information
Works well. Able to quickly look up Stock Ratings.

title: MyCard - Contactless Payment
description:
NFC mobile payment app

Save you card track data and pay in shops with contactless card readers using your mobile phone.

Add the cards using a mini magnetic stripe reader in your phone, or paste the track data into the app.

Store up to 20 cards on your phone and choose which card to use.

App has no internet access and does not share info with other apps.

You need to get the track2 magnetic stripe data from your card using a USB reader. 
Now you can also use an audio jack card reader in your phone.
Both available on Ebay or Amazon for 5-15$.

Android 4.4 or higher and NFC required. Device must be unlocked when using mobile payment.

title: Emma Budgeting - Money & Subscription Manager
description:
Download Emma to improve your personal finances with our free budget planner and expense tracker. Emma is a budgeting app and spending tracker that helps connect all your bank accounts in one place, track expenses, manage subscriptions, save money and avoid overdrafts by budgeting payday to payday.

Emma is a powerful budget planner tracker and money management app that can save you over $600 every year. We use state of the art technology to analyse your spending and transactions, giving you the power to make smarter decisions with your money. Take control of your finances, start budgeting with Emma.

FEATURES

● Manage all your accounts in one place
● Set monthly budgets and money goals
● Track expenses payday to payday
● Automatically categorise transactions
● Find and cancel paid subscriptions
● Identify wasteful bank fees
● Get daily balance notifications
● Avoid overdraft charges
● Get weekly reports on your spending
● Get notified when you get paid
● Save money every month

These are just some of the features you will get when using Emma as you go to budgeting tool. Want to visualise all your bank accounts, credit cards, savings, investments and pensions all in one place? Then Emma is the perfect budget app for you. Just download the app, link your bank accounts and get your free transactions report.

BANK LEVEL SECURITY

● Emma uses SSL 256-bit encryption - the same security protocol that banks use - to ensure that your sensitive personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.
● Emma does not store your online banking credentials.
 
OUR MISSION

We believe anyone deserves a financial advocate. Someone who watches our back no matter who we are and where we come from. Emma doesn’t serve the interests of anyone. We think we can provide a great budgeting experience, which relies on a basic principle, caring about our customers’ financial well being. This is who we are and what we stand for.

Financial planning has never been that easy. Just link your accounts to Emma and let us do the heavy lifting. Whether you're looking to track expenses, manage debt repayments or budget your way to financial freedom, Emma can help with your daily needs. She'll let you know when you're spending too fast, notify you when you get paid and help you stay on track with your monthly budgets with weekly reports and budgeting tips.
 
We have received amazing feedback from the community and have been recommended by Forbes, Financial Times, Politico, The Sunday Times and CITY A.M.
 
MORE FEATURES? THAT’S A PRO

Upgrade to Emma Pro for access to premium features, including:
● Custom categories and unlimited budgeting, so you can track your finances like a ninja
● Rename transactions to edit how your transactions should look like
● Export data to understand your finances on excel
● Create manual Accounts to manage your cash expenses and any other accounts you might have

descriptionHTML:
Download Emma to improve your personal finances with our free budget planner and expense tracker. Emma is a budgeting app and spending tracker that helps connect all your bank accounts in one place, track expenses, manage subscriptions, save money and avoid overdrafts by budgeting payday to payday.

Emma is a powerful budget planner tracker and money management app that can save you over $600 every year. We use state of the art technology to analyse your spending and transactions, giving you the power to make smarter decisions with your money. Take control of your finances, start budgeting with Emma.

FEATURES

● Manage all your accounts in one place
● Set monthly budgets and money goals
● Track expenses payday to payday
● Automatically categorise transactions
● Find and cancel paid subscriptions
● Identify wasteful bank fees
● Get daily balance notifications
● Avoid overdraft charges
● Get weekly reports on your spending
● Get notified when you get paid
● Save money every month

These are just some of the features you will get when using Emma as you go to budgeting tool. Want to visualise all your bank accounts, credit cards, savings, investments and pensions all in one place? Then Emma is the perfect budget app for you. Just download the app, link your bank accounts and get your free transactions report.

BANK LEVEL SECURITY

● Emma uses SSL 256-bit encryption - the same security protocol that banks use - to ensure that your sensitive personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.
● Emma does not store your online banking credentials.

OUR MISSION

We believe anyone deserves a financial advocate. Someone who watches our back no matter who we are and where we come from. Emma doesn’t serve the interests of anyone. We think we can provide a great budgeting experience, which relies on a basic principle, caring about our customers’ financial well being. This is who we are and what we stand for.

comments: Worked great at first. Good visuals and easy to navigate and understand. As soon as my payment for the 6 month subscription went through, it stopped syncing to my bank account and displayed the wrong information. It won't re-sync properly and I've sent multiple emails to the support team with no response. Very dissatisfied.

Decent app but the graphs are hugely inaccurate and very annoying. The peaks and troughs are in completely wrong places. Maybe you could have a data point for each day instead of the average type of graph you are doing at the minute? Also, my numbers keep on doubling for some reason. Some times it says my savings accounts are double, sometimes it says the amount I have spent in my budget has doubled e.g. I'm -200 instead of like 400 up.

So far the app has been very helpful. I was able to spot that I was being charged by Amazon Prime incorrectly and could then put a stop to that. The UI is easy to use, if not a bit of an overload sometimes. Also, being able to set budgets for individual categories and having summaries of spending is great!

Great app! I don't have a problem with debt. However what this app has shown, quickly, is that I was quite wasteful. It's described by some as childish, other than the jellybaby I don't see how. It's basic yes. Once you've set up all your direct debits, payments into categories, set your budgets etc. You're all set. You can see where to save in no time. Easy to use, easy to save. No brainer! Highly recommended. Worth spending the time to set up correctly...

Expected way more ; UI : Wonderfull & beautifull. UX : Horrible, not intuitive except for budget. Cash : If you want to track your cash expenses you need pro and even there its not intuitive. Merchant & subscriptions : Really cool and work well, kind of a great idea. Missing sub-category, any analytic chart. Bugs : didn't detect bank fees, my cheking account was merge with my credit card as 1 account. There might be potential for the futur but right now "Wallet" from Budgetbakers is way better.

title: Smart Receipts
description:
Turn your phone into a receipt scanner, mileage tracker, and expense report generator with Smart Receipts! 

Smart Receipts is perfect for both individuals and businesses!
With fully customizable PDF, CSV, and ZIP reports, you can create professional reports for both your personal finance tracking and your employer’s needs. Smart Receipts allows you to select from over 20 different default data types (including dates, price, tax, receipt categories, comments, payment methods, etc.) to help you generate the perfect report, saving you hours of time doing expenses and getting you back to things you actually care about. 

Tired of spending hours scanning receipts? 
Join over 400,000 users, who save hours each week using Smart Receipts to manage their expenses and generate expense reports. Smart Receipts was designed by a traveling consultant, so it is built for both efficiency and flexibility. 

Trusted and Secure
Smart Receipts is an open source, so you can be trust that your expense data remains yours and won't be secretly sold to third-party advertisers. 

Features:
 • Create expense report "folders" to categorize your receipts
 • Take receipt photos with your camera's phone
 • Import existing pictures on your device
 • Import PDF receipts
 • Save receipt price, tax, and currency
 • Tag receipt names, categories, payment method, comments, and other metadata
 • Create/edit/delete all receipt categories
 • Track distance traveled for mileage reimbursement
 • Automatic exchange rate processing
 • Smart prediction based on past receipts
 • Generate PDF, CSV, & ZIP reports
 • Fully customizable report output
 • Automatic backup support via Google Drive
 • OCR support for receipt scans
 • Graphical breakdowns of spending per category

License:
Smart Receipts is open-source and licensed under the AGPL (https://www.gnu.org/licenses/agpl-3.0.en.html). 

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful, but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the GNU Affero General Public License for more details.

comments: Was not sure going in exactly what I was looking for in an app like this but after using for a couple weeks really came to love it. Takes pictures of receipts . Keep tabs of sales taxes for tax returns. Tons of stuff associated for businesses . Graphs. Detailed print outs. With categories of receipts. Reimbursable. Personal or corporate expenses. Etc. Seriously check it out. Great for companies or individuals AND best part is its absolutely free!

Update: With help from the developer I figured out how to add categories!!! 5 STARS!! Does exactly what I want. I like this, it is simple to use. The only thing I wish it had was more categories. I am not using this for business, just a Mom trying to reduce paperword and track expenses and taxes. Outside of the "meals" and "gasoline" I wish there were things like groceries and items. Or give us the option to name our own categories. Otherwise it is a pretty decent app.

Updated: I've been using this app for over 6 months, it is very accurate at scanning and capturing info from any receipt you put in front of it.. It's frustrating you have to buy scans rather than offer an plan that includes this feature. NOTE: be sure you know how to use the backup facility as the website is only a login portal that you can't view your receipts or track your expenses, this is managed in the app which is a little time consuming, would recommend you email them back to yourself to ensure have copies...

Fairly useful features in one place e.g predictive text based on previous entries, image attached to text entry, reports (folders). Features I like most are the cropping tool, which has a magnifier, to position crop points, and the retake photo function. However, the OCR needs to be much improved and the price of OCR scans is about twice the price I would be happy with. I also like its simplicity.

Slick very easy, love this app takes al the fuss out of expenses, you always have your phone take a photo or upload an image and it complies a very tidy expense report. I also use it to track personal spending and receipts I may need in the future. Very handy app

title: Delta - Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency Portfolio Tracker
description:
Delta is the best app to track your Bitcoin & cryptocurrency portfolio and receive market news.
 
Track all crypto assets you choose, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Litecoin and over 5000 altcoins and get personalized news and alerts. Access real-time prices and market charts in your local currency.

Receive news updates from coins and official news sources to make sure you don’t miss out on your next crypto investment.

Few of the many great features that Delta has to offer:

∆ PORTFOLIO AT A GLANCE - A clear overview of your total portfolio balance, profit & loss during various time periods. See your cryptocurrency investments and trends in not only your local currency but in ANY fiat and cryptocurrency.

∆ DETAILED COIN ANALYSIS - See the current price, chart, market cap, volume, high, low, order book, depth chart, your holdings, your profit/loss. project website, whitepaper and more.

∆ WATCHLIST & MARKETS - A full coinmarketcap style list of coins along with global market data. Add coins to your watchlist if you just want to keep track of certain coins.

∆ HUGE LIBRARY OF COINS - Track over 5000 crypto coins, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, IOTA, NEO, Dash, Monero, and many more!

∆ PORTFOLIO ANALYTICS - A complete analytics dashboard giving you valuable insights into your portfolio(s) such as location of your coins, fees breakdown, most used exchanges and more.

∆ NEWS & DELTA DIRECT - Create a personalized news feed by following coins you like. Delta Direct is a transparent way for asset teams to send updates directly to you. Real news, directly from the source.

∆ EXCHANGE & WALLET CONNECTIONS - Sync your portfolio automatically by connecting with a variety of exchanges and link your ETH, BTC, LTC, NEO, and other wallet addresses to automatically import transactions!

∆ SYNC & BACK-UP DATA ACROSS DEVICES - Transfer or sync your data between devices easily without accounts! Easily back-up your data using our recovery QR code.

∆ PRICE ALERTS - Set up personal notifications for each cryptocurrency. Get daily alerts and notifications when there are significant changes to a coin’s price or your portfolio’s value.

Delta is the best, most advanced, easiest to use, crypto portfolio tracker tool on the market. We’d love to hear from you on ways to improve the app even further. So feel free to get in touch via any of the channels below:

- Telegram: https://telegram.delta.app
- Slack: https://slack.delta.app
- Facebook: https://facebook.delta.app
- Twitter: https://twitter.delta.app
- Email: support@delta.app

There's also a Delta PRO subscription which includes additional perks, such as PRO exclusive portfolio analytics modules, unlimited connections to exchanges and wallets, early access to new features and more. Delta does not sell your data. Not now, not ever.

comments: Offering a one-time payment for Pro would be nice. Besides a few annoying 'ads' pushing you to purchase the subscription, it's a very well-made app.
I love delta but it's been crashing evrrytime I try to open it lately. Please fiiiiix. Thanks guys, your app was awesome forever. I have faith it will open again!
The best one I've found so far. Charts aren't very accurate though (I'm used to Questtrade, which is very accurate in the stock market).
Overall app is ok but some features don't work and lack of customer support is frustrating. Not worth the price.

Been using this app for well over a year. Overall great please to have a consolidated view of holdings. I will say that performance has been on the steady decline. Seems like with every new feature update things are getting slower and slower. Please focus on optimization of your current code, things used to load instantly now takes 10-15 seconds every time switching views

title: My Stocks Portfolio & Widget
description:
✓ Track stocks and equity, funds, ETFs, currencies in the stock market, and unlisted equity

✓ Manage your stock portfolios and view performance over time, with metrics such as realized gains, unrealized gains, daily and total changes, and annualized gains

✓ View allocation balance of each stock holding in your overall portfolio with pie charts

✓ Multiple stocks portfolios support - track multiple stock markets, stock portfolios, or watchlists

✓ Convert stock portfolios to one currency using real-time foreign exchange rates - mix stock quotes and holdings from different stock markets and display it using a currency of your choice

✓ Stock market news feed and news for each stock quote. Customize which international markets to retrieve news for.

✓ Real-time stock quotes for US exchanges and some international stock markets

✓ Foreign exchange rates and currency converter

✓ Track the Cryptocurrency market. Supports Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, and alt coins such as Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Monero, and more.

✓ Stocks widget that displays stock quotes and holdings

comments: I love this app for tracking my investments. Liked it enough to go premium. Definitely worth supporting the developer. I wish it could track upcoming dividend ex and pay dates. Maybe in an enableable column. I realize that isn't the main function of this app and the app is great without it, but it's a feature that I have to look elsewhere to track. I'd pay extra for this feature.

Stock prices have an est 3 min lag. Otherwise would be graded higher. Features are superior to other like apps out there. The lag in live pricing is a huge detriment. The lag is on BITUSD. On weekdays, yes, its a few seconds behind. Maybe 5 to 10 secs. Transactions can also get murkey, esp when many. Maybe put the open and recent trades on top? Box off the closed trades, or paired off transactions? Cleaner trade log to read. There is lots of potential in this app.

I have used it for about a month. Passwords are extremely annoying but if it could be as simple as some other sites such as capital one finger trace of a pattern, I would love to keep my data from the prying eyes such as a lost phone. Very thoughtful and easily learned.

Good app for monitoring and for current news, but needs more options under the transaction tab to change the currency to whatever you like( Price per shares and commissions ). For example, if I purchased RY stocks, I'd like the option to change the price per shares and commissions to Canadian. Thanks.

I like this app bit recently the widget isn't refreshing. I've checked all the settings and they are all ok and there are no permissions requested that I could find. If I manually refresh it does work but I would like it to refresh on it's own as it should

title: PocketGuard: Personal Finance, Money & Budget
description:
PocketGuard is one of the leading, easiest to use personal finance apps in the US and Canada. This handy tool can finally make money management and budgeting trouble-free. Paying bills, managing multiple accounts, staying on top of your spending habits — all of this is now available in one place.

Money management in one place
● Manage your bank accounts, credit and debit cards in one place — even if you are using different banks
● Sync your loans, savings, and investment data — get an actual, transparent picture of your finances 
● Connect all of your financial accounts in one place and see what’s really going on with your money 

Spending tracker with a clear picture of your finances
● Track your income and expenses 
● See exactly how much is in your pocket
● Compare your spending habits month by month 
● Create spending limits and get timely notifications when the balance is low
● Establish saving goals and reach them with the spending tracker
● Stay on top of your spending habits — see exactly how much money is spent and where exactly it goes

Lower your bills
Certain you’re getting the best deal with all of your monthly payments? Cut your regular bills for Comcast, AT&T and many other providers by up to 25% without leaving the app.

Timely notifications and alerts
● Receive timely reminders about credit card bills and loan payments
● Get alerted when a bank fee or any unwanted charge hits your account

Security and data protection
● 256-bit SSL encoding protects all of your sensitive data 
● Additional 4-digit PIN ensures no one can access your financial data if the phone is lost or stolen 
● Read-only connection with your bank makes it impossible for anyone (you included) to move money from your bank account via PocketGuard; for all of the bank transactions, you will have to use a dedicated online banking app

Simplicity and intuitive navigation
Despite its vast functionality, PocketGuard is simple and user-friendly! Visual, intuitive navigation makes personal finance management a walk in the park! 

Share your feedback to make the app even better!
PocketGuard is an app designed to help people easily manage their finances. So, no one but you can help make the app even better. If you have any questions, or simply want to suggest a new feature — drop a line at hello@pocketguard.com — make no mistake, our developers will listen!
descriptionHTML:
PocketGuard is one of the leading, easiest to use personal finance apps in the US and Canada. This handy tool can finally make money management and budgeting trouble-free. Paying bills, managing multiple accounts, staying on top of your spending habits — all of this is now available in one place.

Money management in one place
● Manage your bank accounts, credit and debit cards in one place — even if you are using different banks
● Sync your loans, savings, and investment data — get an actual, transparent picture of your finances
● Connect all of your financial accounts in one place and see what’s really going on with your money

Spending tracker with a clear picture of your finances
● Track your income and expenses
● See exactly how much is in your pocket
● Compare your spending habits month by month
● Create spending limits and get timely notifications when the balance is low
● Establish saving goals and reach them with the spending tracker
● Stay on top of your spending habits — see exactly how much money is spent and where exactly it goes

Lower your bills
Certain you’re getting the best deal with all of your monthly payments? Cut your regular bills for Comcast, AT&T and many other providers by up to 25% without leaving the app.

Timely notifications and alerts
● Receive timely reminders about credit card bills and loan payments
● Get alerted when a bank fee or any unwanted charge hits your account

Security and data protection
● 256-bit SSL encoding protects all of your sensitive data
● Additional 4-digit PIN ensures no one can access your financial data if the phone is lost or stolen
● Read-only connection with your bank makes it impossible for anyone (you included) to move money from your bank account via PocketGuard; for all of the bank transactions, you will have to use a dedicated online banking app

Simplicity and intuitive navigation
Despite its vast functionality, PocketGuard is simple and user-friendly! Visual, intuitive navigation makes personal finance management a walk in the park!

Share your feedback to make the app even better!
PocketGuard is an app designed to help people easily manage their finances. So, no one but you can help make the app even better. If you have any questions, or simply want to suggest a new feature — drop a line at hello@pocketguard.com — make no mistake, our developers will listen!
summary: Stay on top of your money, budget and bills from one secure personal finance app
developerAddress:
1906 EL CAMINO REAL
SUITE 201
MENLO PARK, CA 94027
recentChanges:
New charts in the category details show you how your spending has changed over time. The category details also incorporate "Spending limits" to let you adjust your spending plan right from the "Insights".

We've also revamped the "Bills" and the "Income" sections to make everything cleaner and easier to navigate.
comments: I use this app to track categorized spending. In that way it's really good at keeping me within limits. The 'In Your Pocket' feature is helpful. Not very intuitive to find previous months spending but not hard either Edit: after months of more use its done quite poorly and is glitchy at pulling in transactions. The support team was consistent and friendly in following up but really did nothing to fix the issue. The features make it a potential 5 star app but they have a lot to fix first

Good for a baseline idea but not easy to keep going. Does not do well with consistent synchronization of income which constantly gives alerts as if ur not paid changing overview report into giving you bad data. Most likely will cancel my premium subscription if this cannot be resolved. Otherwise its pointless to keep using app.

Easy to setup and shows me what I need to see: After bills, how much I can spend that month. I've tried every other budget tool and they are complicated and time consuming to manage. This one is really easy to setup and use and so far I'm loving it.

The ideas behind the app are sound and the simplicity is really nice, but upgrading adds little to no additional features. It took several months to not require manually reconnecting banking information, there was a bug that caused some duplication of transactions (that has yet to be cleaned up) and generally a lack of some basic features make this app little better than a spreadsheet. The main reason I am deleting is due to the horriblely non responsive customer service.

So far, I'm loving this app. I've downloaded and deleted at least 4 other budget apps. All I wanted was a simple, organized look at my bills and spending habits. Every other app complicated the process, so it took me hours just to link my accounts and set up my profile, only to find irreconcilable issues and being at square one again. I haven't had those problems, this app is easy and straightforward, takes you step-by-step through the process so you understand each function.

title: MyWallSt: Invest in our Shortlist of Great Stocks
description:
MyWallSt makes it easy to invest with confidence and buy stocks that regularly outperform the market.

Market Downturns Can Lead to Great Profits.

We can help you build a portfolio of high-growth stocks primed to outlive any downturn. Start now before this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to buy low is gone.

By hand-picking the top 1% of stocks on the market and pairing them with unparalleled investment insights and stock research, it’s never been easier to invest in stocks poised to grow for the long-term.

With over 7,000 companies on the U.S. stock market, building an investment portfolio can feel overwhelming. But with MyWallSt, you’ll get the tools, guidance, and analysis you need to make intelligent investing decisions with the tap of a finger.

The MyWallSt investment app is backed by a team of renowned investing experts and stock market thought leaders who use the same long-term investing philosophy handed down by history’s greatest stock investors. These experts then handpick the top 1% of U.S. listed companies to feature in the MyWallSt app as investing guidance.

MyWallSt Features:

LEARN ABOUT STOCKS

- Daily, exclusive investment news, research and updates from our team of stock analysts.

- Transparent, timely insights and opinions on each stock we feature to help you discover the key attributes that make it a great investment.

- Build a stock Watchlist of companies you’re interested in and track their growth in real-time.

BUY STOCKS & BUILD YOUR PORTFOLIO

- Invest in the stock market without leaving the MyWallSt app by creating a brokerage account with our trusted, integrated partner, Drivewealth.

- Buy any stock with as little as $10 using fractional investing.

- Use our stock tracker and portfolio breakdown feature to build a perfectly diversified portfolio to weather any stock market conditions.

INVEST WITH ZERO STRESS

- Our investment app replaces investing’s traditional paperwork, middlemen and confusing jargon with a clear, streamlined path to successful long-term investing.

- No risky trade strategies so you won’t need to monitor your stock portfolio day in and day out. Set it, forget it and watch your investments grow.

INVESTMENT INSIGHTS YOU CAN TRUST

- MyWallSt’s stock research and insights come from world-renowned investor and our CEO, Emmet Savage.

- Emmet’s personal investing track record has been independently audited by KPMG. Over the past 10 years, his average annual return is 30.08%. Over the past twenty years, his personal stock picks have beaten the market nearly four-to-one every single year. 

- MyWallSt is Emmet’s way of sharing his passion for investing with anyone who wants to create long-term, generational wealth through the stock market.

Register with us to start your free trial and get started investing with MyWallSt’s unmatched guidance and expertise in your corner.


Download MyWallSt today!

For more information please visit www.MyWallSt.com

Subscriptions to MyWallSt start at $16.49.
You won't be charged if you cancel before your free trial ends.

comments: Very easy to use, frequent new content to read from the MyWallSt team, and a super convenient way to keep an eye on my stock portfolio. I even bought new stocks while riding on the tram the other day, with just one hand, it's that easy! Great work guys!

I had left a poor review of this app, but I am updating it after I was able to get in touch with someone. I deleted my account after a few days. I didnt thoroughly use it as I wasnt initially comfortable the way it was set up. Customer service was friendly and great, just think I will stick with a person not an app.

Installed and immediately uninstalled. There's no way to maneuver through the app to get a feel of it before you 1. Setup an account and 2. Link bank/google account to it and/or start a free trial. I'll stick with Robinhood for my investing and MyStocks portfolio for in depth coverage of my stocks.

Tricky to get started with. You need to connect a DriveWealth account and even fund that which for a UK user was more steps than expected in 2019. That said, useful insights and watchlist functionality have made it easy to get on board with investing
This is awesome for some one who knows nothing about investment. I love the details and resources to do your own work!

title: Stocktwits - Stock Market Chat
description:
Tap into the pulse of the markets and cryptocurrency trading with Stocktwits.

Use StockTwits to catch up quickly on the stocks you care about and new market trends, build a watch list, or discuss what's happening with your favorite and upcoming virtual currencies. Find out what is happening fast and get insight, updates, sentiment and analysis from thousands of real investors and traders.

"Whenever I want to know why something is happening to a company, the first thing I do is check out the real-time feeds on StockTwits"
- Herb Greenberg, CNBC

"…StockTwits is re-imagining investing to better match the way markets really work."
- Read Write Web

* SEE WHAT STOCKS EVERYONE IS TALKING ABOUT: Our Trending List finds stocks that are in the news, making moves, or popular amongst top investors and traders.

* CHAT AND PROFIT: Connect and chat with top investors and traders to discover your next big winner.

* UP-TO-DATE EARNINGS CALENDAR: Quickly see the stocks with upcoming earnings reports on our new earnings calendar feature.

recentChanges: General Fixes/Clean up
comments: Great app. One suggestion i have is to open a video section & give the pro traders an option to explain things like options. A lot of new people come here & lose their money to more experienced Traders. You could also make money off video ads which I believe pay better and get you more traffic and maybe take some of those ads out of the chat area and it will make it look better. I love your app it's great it should just have more teaching tools to help people learn.

Big fan of the app really great. The only thing that it's missing is a widget for my homescreen. I would love to see a widget that allows me to quickly look at the feed of peoples ideas about stocks without having to open the app. Sometimes I'm busy and I like widgets for that quick easy content. Highly recommend you guys develop one! Keep up the good work! Also make a version thats compatible for tablets!

App takes about 16 to 20 minutes to open, using my Android. Moto Z2, all this took place on their last update. Prior to the up date I had zero problems. I asked ST for help but the only recommendation I received was to delete and reinstall. Did all that to no avail. Also I read quite a few comments and ST has responded to most with the exception of a handful complains such as mine . It has been since December 18 2019 since I was contacted by ST and provided the info and that was that.

Erased my watchlist after an update, now says invalid access token when I try to retype what I remember. I did a lot of research to find those companies and time is money. Should've never trusted an app with something that important. Besides that, it's an ok app to get info from some traders. Beware of traders trying to trick you into buying bad stocks or dumping good ones.
App is terrible. So loaded with ads and bugs it usually doesn't even start, just locks up your phone. Contacted devs, they did nothing but waste more of my time. Avoid this app.

title: Paycheck Calculator Paystub
description:
For help and free online paystub visit our site: https://paystubscheck.com/

Do you need proof of income or employment? 
Welcome to my Paystub calculator.
What is a pay stub?
Federal Tax 
Salary Tax Calculator
Sales Tax Calculator
Social Security
TaxCaster
H&R Block Tax
TurboTax Tax Return
Simply put, a pay stub is a paper we keep after cashing our payroll checks.
Not only does a pay stub serve as proof of income, it also helps you keep track of salary information, taxes paid, overtime pay and more.

This app will help you generate one in a minute.
Real Check Stubs are delivered to your phone or device instantly for immediate printing.
Enter your information into the spaces below to start creating your PayStub, our template will take care of all math and calculations making it easier for you. Once finished, you can preview your stub
Generate, print and use. It’s that simple!
This App is for any Country.

comments: Purchase lifetime subscription in 2019. Now when tried to generate payroll report it says you need to subscribe for it. After click on subscription it will take you to subscription plans. When I click on life time purchase, it says you have already purchased it. But still I can not generate a payroll.
Man I thought I found the perfect app. It does not calculate exemptions correctly. I hope they fix it other wise it's a great app. Please fix problem.

When I used the app last year it worked. Now it's broken. Whenever I click generate, it switches screens but does not generate a viewable pay stub any longer. It just has a back and save button. When I click save it has a pop up that says save to PDF. But it does nothing. Can you please help me?

Since the update my app is not working it says I have to subscribe and pay again then once I try it says I'm already subscribed then I tried to generate and it says the watermark will be removed once I upgrade and generate
Does not work. Emailed and no response. Will contest the charge on my bill for this useless app

title: Zirtue: Lend & Borrow Money With Friends & Family
description:
Zirtue is a relationship-based lending application that simplifies loans between friends, family and trusted relationships with automatic ACH loan payments.

We get it. You need to loan money to friends and family with confidence. Zirtue allows you to get paid back with automatic monthly (ACH) loan payments from the Borrowers bank account to your bank account. Zirtue automates and simplifies the repayment process, so you can focus on your relationships.

We've all either loaned to or borrowed money from our friends and family with reasonable expectations that everything will go smooth. The reality is usually something different, unexpected or just awkward.  

YOUR FRIENDS | YOUR FAMILY | YOUR LOAN | AUTOMATIC MONTHLY PAYMENTS

LEND & BORROW MONEY
Within minutes you can lend or borrow money with friends and family on your terms.

- Borrow money from friends and family
- Loan money to friends and family
- Digital agreement on loan terms
- Automatic monthly loan payments
- Payment notifications and reminders
- Personal Dashboard to track your loans


RELATIONSHIP BASED LENDING
Zirtue is a private secure lending app that allows you to leverage your personal relationships instead of your personal credit score to lend and borrow money.

TRACK & MANAGE
Easily track and manage your loan activity using your private dashboard to view all loan activity and message lenders and borrowers.

SIMPLY SAFE & SECURE
Zirtue simplifies loans between friends and family. We're serious about security and use cutting-edge technology to ensure your personal information is fully encrypted and securely stored.

YOU SET THE PERIOD FOR REPAYMENT
3 Months - Minimum Period for Repayment
3 Years - Maximum Period for Repayment
5% - Fixed Annual Percentage Rate (APR)

HERE’S AN EXAMPLE
$300 - Loan Amount From Family
$302.50 - Total Cost of Loan
3 Month - Repayment Period

Monthly Payments
1. $100.83 (Includes $1.25 Interest-APR)
2. $100.83 (Includes $0.84 Interest-APR)
3. $100.85 (Includes $0.42 Interest-APR)

recentChanges:
Here’s what under the hood in this update:

— Zirtue is 100% FREE for Lenders! Borrowers pay one low subscription cost with unlimited access and no service fees

— Zirtue partners with Kiva.org to donate $1 per month for each active subscription — Let’s pay it forward!

— Borrowers can now select a Payback Period between 3 months and 3 years —More flexibility

— Added Metadata to highlight Payback Period, Interest Rate (APR) along with an example of Payment Schedule with Total Cost of Loan
comments: I am very pleased with my zirtue experience. The app was simple to use and I could easily manage where I had money coming and going. Would recommend as an easy way track and maintain loan payments between friends and family.
Zirtue was great for me to keep track of my friends paying me back. Super easy to use and took the worry out of getting paid back.
Great response time to any issues that may occur. Overall solid company.
This is an awesome concept. It reduces the awkwardness and makes the process waaaay more systematic.
Brilliant App....for lending and borrowing money...😊👍

title: Spendee - Budget and Expense Tracker & Planner
description:
Thanks to Spendee you will be able to track your money (both expense and income) automatically through bank sync 💳 or manually so that you can analyze 📊, organize and budget 💰 them for the future. DOWNLOAD NOW

Invite others to manage your shared family or household budgets. Manage your money in multiple currencies and across multiple bank accounts.   

 
 THE MOST FAVORITE FEATURES OF SPENDEE

1/ All your money in one place 

💳 Connect securely your bank accounts so that all your incomes and expenses are added 
     and categorize automatically. Save time on what is really important.
👆   Add your cash expenses manually in only 7 seconds
📊 Easily track where all your money goes at the end of the month
📅 Ultimate bill tracker, never forget to pay for gas, water, loan etc.

 2/ Save money by sticking to your budgets 

💰 Adding budget goal is quick and easy, as well as adding your spending & savings
💸 Create budget for every category or have one overall budget

 3/ Track money during special event such as traveling or wedding planning 

💱 Multiple currencies, making it perfect for traveling or vacations

 4/ Manage your finances with unlimited number of people 

 👫  Create shared wallets with your friends and family
🏡 Comprehensive household budget planner & manager

 WHO IS SPENDEE FOR 

It's for everyone! It's great household budget planner for the family to control income and expenses. Also It's useful spending and savings tracker for students and adults. This money manager app will save you money and prepare your finances for the future!

DOWNLOAD OUR BUDGETING APP TODAY AND HAVE YOUR INCOME & EXPENSES UNDER CONTROL WITH A FINANCE MANAGER.

Best of all, the more you use Spendee, the more valuable it gets, by rewarding you with attractive charts that show you where your money is going and how your costs are matching up with your income. Sync your bank account with Spendee and start track your savings today.

Spendee really makes managing personal finances as easy as possible!
Download now!
 
Follow us on https://facebook.com/spendeeapp and https://twitter.com/spendeeapp
Email us at hello@spendee.com

developerAddress: Namesti I.P. Pavlova 5, 120 00, Prague, Czech Republic
recentChanges: Bug fixes and minor improvements.
comments: Love using this app. It it very user friendly and you can categorize everything to your liking. I chose to pay extra for the "Plus" plan which allows more budgets... I like that I can have multiple budgets for different things like bills, vehicle, groceries etc. The notifications it gives me when im getting close to my budget or went over budget helps me keep on track. Wish there was a way to set up something other than a wallet for a credit card for example.

I have started my free trial but have yet to be able to connect to my bank to even give this app a try. Everytime I try it gives me a screen after my password that says "please select the contact information you want to use to log in". Then a line, like I'm supposed to know what that is. I've tried entering "text, "mobile" my phone #, " "cell". Until I try a few times & it wont even let me connect again. I'd like to try it but cant even get past the 1st part

Overall - nice but very buggy. I am using Spendee Plus plan and at some point it stopped synchronizing shared wallets. Every new transaction or edit causes an uninformative error message to pop up. Tapping on "Contact customer support" offers you to send a message to one of your contacts via any available messenger, the message is "Need your help". Seems like the users are supposed to help themselves...

Tried Premium, but it wouldn't reconnect to my bank account with Halifax after the first day of setting up the app. I tried contacting technical support but never got a reply, only loads of spam emails. Can't understand how this is a paid subscription when the app doesn't work and there is no attempt to fix the connection issues. Edit- thanks for the quick response, I sent the email through the help button on your Web app. I also filled in a form sent to me by email about bank connection issues

Best app in market to manage it money 💰 Easy & comfortable UI. Have one suggestion, if the user is able to select two tags that will be amazing. Eg: I can select food tag & travel tag, which means I spent 400 on food and my total travel spend will also be added. And that can be displayed in pie chart as second layer. Hell lot of effort required. But it's a great update.

title: Splitwise
description:
Splitwise is the easiest way to share expenses with friends and family and stop stressing about “who owes who.” Millions of people around the world use Splitwise to organize group bills for households, trips, and more. Our mission is to reduce the stress and awkwardness that money places on our most important relationships.
 
Splitwise is great for:
- Roommates splitting rent and apartment bills
- Group trips around the world
- Splitting a vacation house for skiing or at the beach
- Weddings and bachelor/bachelorette parties
- Couples sharing relationship costs
- Friends and co-workers who go out to lunch or dinner together frequently
- Loans and IOUs between friends 
- And so much more

Splitwise is simple to use:
- Create groups or private friendships for any splitting situation
- Add expenses, IOUs, or informal debts in any currency, with support for offline entry
- Expenses are backed up online so any everyone can log in, view their balances, and add expenses
- Keep track of who should pay next, or settle up by recording cash payments or using our integrations
 
Endorsements:
“Makes it easy to split everything from your dinner bill to rent.” - NY Times
"Fundamental for tracking finances. As good as WhatsApp for containing awkwardness." – The Financial Times
“I never fight with roommates over bills because of this genius expense-splitting app”- Business Insider
“The Single Best App You Can Download for Group Trips of Any Kind” - Thrillist
 
Here are some of our industry-leading features:
- Multi-platform support for Android, iOS, and web
- Simplify debts into the easiest repayment plan
- Expense categorization
- Calculate group totals
- Export to CSV
- Comment directly on expenses
- Split expenses equally or unequally by percentages, shares, or exact amounts
- Add informal debts and IOUs
- Create bills that recur monthly, weekly, yearly, fortnightly
- Add multiple payers on a single expense
- See total balances with a person across multiple groups and private expenses
- Custom user avatars
- Cover photos for groups 
- Activity feed and push notifications help you stay on top of changes
- View your edit history for changes to an expense
- Any deleted group or bill can be restored easily
- World-class customer support
- Pay back using our integrated payments: Venmo and PayPal (US only), Paytm (India only)
- 100+ currencies and growing
- 7+ supported languages

Get Splitwise Pro for even more amazing features!
- Convert expenses to different currencies using our Open Exchange Rates integration
- Access to “spending by category” budgeting tools and other charts
- OCR integration for scanning and itemizing receipts
- Store high-resolution receipts in the cloud (10GB cloud storage)
- Backups to JSON, downloadable from our website
- Search full expense history
- Save default splits

recentChanges: - Refinements to the Settle up flow, to better support people who transact in multiple currencies.
comments: No need of calculator. Just use Splitwise, which automatically calculates the money you get/give to the other people of your group, so just sit back-relax and don't forget to mention your expenses. Rest the app will do. Works great for group expenses.

Very useful and unique. With time, splitwise I has evolted drastically incorporating the best of what one could seek. Nice UI and easy to use interface. Features are interestingly good. Would love to see a new theme though. And may be some more integrations.
It's a great application. Me and my friends use it everyday! We used to use splid application before this . But this is better... Great job !
This app doesn't deserves a subscription based model. This not Netflix or a software like the ranks of Adobe CC. Introduce a one time purchase model to get a better rating.
Saved my wallet in many situations. Recommended :) Really easy to use, both for readers and for writers.

title: TSP Tips
description:
TSP Tips uses analysis to help you avoid market downturns and keep your retirement safe.  We notify you when you should move your money between funds, and where to move it to; it's that simple.

• Market analysis to maximize growth and minimize risk
• We had positive gains during the 2008 financial crisis, and a 25% gain in 2013
• Backed by professional licensing and 20 years of PhD research, experience, and proven results

We'll send you weekly market summaries with a recommendation on whether or not to move your funds (and where to move them to). Notifications are pushed right to your phone and your inbox, and to additional email addresses if you like.

Start getting investment tips today with a free trial of up to 3 months.  After that it's about $5 a month for an annual subscription, or a little more on a monthly basis.

We believe good investment guidance should be available to everyone, and shouldn't require a finance degree or deep pockets.  Making it to retirement is harder than ever, and we'd love to help you get there.

Come visit us at https://www.tsptips.com.

recentChanges: Initial app release
comments: TSP Tips is fairly useless. You will get better results if you just never download this app and just put all of your money in a late L fund or just 100% in the C Fund or better yet, a mix of the C/S/I funds.     If you google "I subscribed to TSP Tips so I could backtest it. Completely unsurprising results inside." you'll see a good analysis on Reddit for the performance of the service.

This app is a good baseline but needs improvement. I rated 5 stars based on the function of it as it should theoretically pay for itself and save me lots of time in research. However, it is very bland with no features.

Absolutely horrible, I was up most of the year managing myself started following once I joined. I have lost $20000 since I started following the advice seems to be a day late and a dollar short. So disappointed even after my friends convinced me to go to it for several years. I will be canceling this week. I should have known when the social media site sucked only 95 people liked it nothing been active on it for 5 years the website is horrible.
great service but keeps giving old recommendations for interfund transfer.
I've only lost money with this app, used it for two years. Dont recommend.
