Contact the developer of Fast Budget - Expense Management via email for any
problem or suggestion:
support@fastbudget.it
summary: Manage your personal finances and easily track your money, expenses, budget
recentChanges:
Thank you for choosing Fast Budget!
Each update includes bug fixes and general improvements. If an update includes new features, we will highlight them in the app.
If you need support after an update, contact us from the Settings page, Support section inside the app (Or at support@fastbudget.it). We will be glad to help you.
comments: Update. It does look like the problem has been remedied for now. The app is very good, and working as usual. I like the new (?) calculator addition🙂 Intrusive ads on the paid version! I bought the app only to find I am continuously being interrupted by intrusive ads while I am trying to enter data. Very disappointed. The app is fine. I didn't know I would be interrupted with ads even after paying for the app. Intrusive.

very easy to enter transactions. only thing I miss from previous app is subcategories eg motor with sub categories for tax fuel insurance mot and maintenance. otherwise best app I've used Ann Sword love the subcategories another enhancement would be balance showing after every transaction which would make balancing easier to bank statement
Excellent app. One question: do you have an option to automatically transfer my unused monthly budget residual to the next month's budget?

I bought this app same day I downloaded it, about a week ago. I use it daily to record my income from 20 different accounts. I record my spending also. The budget feature doesnt seem to work right, or I'm not doing it right. Which is a bummer but I'm really loving this app. Real shame you cant use it on more then one device at a time without subscribing. It would be real nice to be able to delete categories and subcategories.
It's a great app. I wish it was quicker to sync when you have multiple people set up to the same account other wise it's been perfect.

title: HP 12c Financial Calculator
description:
The authentic HP 12c Calculator app is now available for the millions of business professionals and students who rely on the HP 12c Financial Calculator. Get fast answers with the same algorithms and calculation sequences you trust for real estate, banking, and finance. When you find yourself without your calculator, relax – just open the app on your Android™ tablet or smart phone.

Features:
· Authentic app, developed by HP
· Identical layout, functions, and features as the original HP 12c Financial Calculator
· RPN entry 
· Quickly calculate loan payments, TVM, NPV, IRR, cashflows, bonds, and more 
· Keep the power of your HP 12c handy on your Android™ tablet or smart phone

recentChanges: Addresses display issues seen with Android 7 on some devices.
comments: After working fine for years, app stopped working. Both portrait and landscape models are frozen. Developer does not respond to email help request. OK... an update here. I found a ”solution” (more like a work-around) from other reviewers. To paraphrase, if the app does not reply to input, turn the phone on its side into landscape mode. Tap ”Menu”, then ”Reset”. That made the app function again but does not excuse the total lack of response from HP. Leaving rating at 2 for that reason.

I have had this app for years and it was useful, just like the physical calculator. It recently stopped working and Uninstall and re-install did not fix the problem. Maybe the October 2019 update broke the app. In any event, it is useless now.

I used to love this app... But now it has stopped working, and it no longer responds to user inputs. The haptic feedback works, but there is no number display, which renders it useless The last update is listed as late October, so I suspect that screwed things up. Let's get on it, HP! Okay - it seems that all I needed to do was to re-set the application, and now it works perfectly. That puts it back up to 5-star territory. There was no better financial calculator & there is no better emulator.

Recently purchased the Galaxy Note 10+ now this app doesn't run on this device. Have uninstalled and reinstalled and still doesn't work. Wonder what HP will do about it? I have just discovered if you go into landscape view hit the menu then reset. It started to work.

Stopped working suddenly but a few weeks later after re-installing it worked again. I use this app for work and paid for it, so I expect it to work ALL the time! When it does work, it's great. Just like the old HP-12C.

title: Honeydue: Budget, Bills & Money for Couples
description:
Honeydue is the best personal finance app for couples. Track your bills, bank balances and spending together, and engage in meaningful dialogue about your goals and habits.

EXCITING NEWS
• Introducing Joint Banking, a modern bank account designed for modern couples. Each of you and your partner gets your own account number and debit card on top of a shared balance. Track your budget in real time and get on the same page. Reserve your cards today.

WHY HONEYDUE?
• Choose how much you share with your partner.
• See all of your bank account balances in one place, neatly organized.
• Set monthly household spending limits on each category, and get notified when you and your partner are nearing it.
• Add your own custom categories
• Get reminded you when it's time to pay your bills.
• Send a thumbs up to encourage your partner's spending habits, or choose from 6 other emojis
• Ask your partner if that mysterious purchase was theirs
• Divvy up expenses, and square up balances with your partner when the time is right
• Automatic categorization of all your spending
• Support for over 10,000+ banks (US, Canada, UK, Spain & France)
• Bank level security for your peace of mind: 
Your data is encrypted in storage and in transit.
• SSL/TLS, passcode & TouchID, and multi-factor authentication.
• See the big picture and argue less about the little things
• Free up your time from financial chores and go enjoy your day!
• It's FREE!

Any questions or feedback? Reach out to us at
support@honeydue.com

Thanks for using Honeydue :)

comments: This is the first app my husband and I have LOVED while budgeting together. It offers the perfect amount of information, notifies us of bills, and tracks our individual card changes. My only critique is that we're unable to adjust the way the calendar counts a "week" currently it's Sunday to Saturday, however, and option to start our week on payday would make or budgeting more simple.

There is no search option when looking for paid bills I can see after a year or so that I would want to see what I paid for a bill to compare. Shoukd have a search box to find the bill. Also I should be able to interact with the bill calendar by tapping on a date to see what's due.

At first it accepted all banks but one. Then after a few weeks I would have to reauthorize the accounts. If you have a bank account that makes you enter a security question when you log into the bank, it won't sync with Honeydue, from my experience. And now it won't ever log into the one I need to see the most...
I like the features available in the app but dont seem to work consistently. Main complaint is the notifications; don't work at all which was a main feature for me.
Doesnt sync properly with Bank account. Had to email mulpite times to get it fixed. Options given to fix it were wait longer or basically reset.

title: FX Meter
description:
In the Urban Forex FX Meter currency strength app you will get an overview that is updated every business day on:
- Two time frames for all major currencies: USD, CHF, EUR, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, NZD
- Current strength/weakness of the 8 major currencies 
- Changes since yesterday
- How the current and yesterday's strength weakness of each currency relates to the other currencies (e.g. weaker, stronger, equal)
- An overview of the trend in strength/weakness of a currency, with historical data that dates back as far as January 2014
- A free course on how to use the FX Meter
descriptionHTML:
In the Urban Forex FX Meter currency strength app you will get an overview that is updated every business day on:
- Two time frames for all major currencies: USD, CHF, EUR, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, NZD
- Current strength/weakness of the 8 major currencies
- Changes since yesterday
- How the current and yesterday's strength weakness of each currency relates to the other currencies (e.g. weaker, stronger, equal)
- An overview of the trend in strength/weakness of a currency, with historical data that dates back as far as January 2014
- A free course on how to use the FX Meter
summary: The strength numbers in the FX Meter app are based on human analysis.
developerAddress: 82/F International Commerce Centre, 1 Austin Road West, Kowloon, Hong Kong
comments: FX Meter +/- recommendations don't correlate to trading opportunities. The challenge with this app is that the information is too old and by the time the app provides its daily updates, there are very few opportunities to make profits. I find the app and system to be a total waste of money. In response to Black Tower, you should really review what your associate Navin from Urban Forex states on his YouTube videos. He discusses in several videos the correlation of the FX Meter to making trades.
Very useful. Definitely worth the investment. It's just very often when I am not on the app, suddenly the app just pop up and cut whatever I'm doing. Is there a solution for this?

"Cannot establish connection with GooglePlay billing service ErrorCode 3" any one please help, i get this message when I try to launch the app, I have reinstalled it and still experiencing it same issue, please help.

Powerfull Fx meter i've ever come across with.however, i recently bought this Android and i have an active annual subscription on my IOS device. It would be nice to enjoy my subscription on this phone too, without having to pay for another subscription! Otherwise, just keep the numbers coming guys they are very powerful.
This app is the cherry on top! HOURS of time spent on trade selection have been drastically cut! Makes it a breeze to know what I should be working with for the day. A very wise investment!

title: Pro Credit Card Reader NFC
description:
This app was made to read public data on an NFC banking card compliant with EMV norm.

✔ Read multiple cards
✔ Store cards
✔ Read applications
✔ Track 1&2 data
✔ Extended history
✔ Export data
✔ Disable application launch with NFC

This application is an analysis tool to read contactless NFC EMV credit cards data.
In some new EMV card, holder name and the transaction history have been removed by issuer to protect privacy.
Be sure your card is NFC compliant (NFC logo printed on them).
This app is not a payment app and does not contain ads.
For security reason, this app doesn't access to Internet (No Internet permission) and you must confirm that you own the credit card before access to the application. 
By default, credit card number is masked.


Compatible EMV cards:
• Visa
• American Express
• MasterCard
• LINK (UK) ATM network
• CB (France)
• JCB
• Dankort (Denmark)
• CoGeBan (Italy)
• Banrisul (Brazil)
• Saudi Payments Network (Saudi Arabia) 
• Interac (Canada)
• UnionPay
• Zentraler Kreditausschuss (Germany) 
• Euro Alliance of Payment Schemes (Italy)
• Verve (Nigeria)
• The Exchange Network ATM Network
• RuPay (India)
• ПРО100 (Russia)

Banking card reader, credit card reader, NFC card, EMV

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you.
This version includes a new enrollment process to be sure that your are the card owner and includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.
comments: Careful using apps like this. Had some POS use this app to steal and hack my credit card information! Apparently it's so easy to use that it allows someone else who steals your credit card to access your credit card account and information 😠
reads cards without problems. but after reading one card it stops scanning, so you cannot add another
Works fine, but the app doesn't start with deactivated NFC. It should be needed only for reading cards

Used to be great, but the (sometime) recently updated version doesn't reveal the number anymore until the last 4 digits are entered. This makes it useless as my main use was for cards which don't have the number printed on the front (ie Maestro cards in Europe). If you need this app, then be prepared to install a 2nd similar app to make this useful...

Paid App offers no additional features than the free version. Except for the ability to store more than one card. The most needed feature is to display the full card information without the need to enter the 4 last digits of the credit card. I want my money back!

title: Volkron CheckBook
description:
Volkron CheckBook is a ledger to keep track of your bank accounts and manage your finances efficiently. Keep track of all your payments and deposits, control your expenses, and manage your budget. A digital checkbook replacement for the classical paper checkbook. It has an elegant and intuitive design, and supports many currencies and number formats. This checkbook app has the most user friendly interface.

Key Features:

* Many currencies and number formats supported.

* Insert automatically the decimal separator.

* Create duplicate transactions (a new transaction with the same or editable information)

* Multiple accounts:
- All the accounts that you need.
- Transfer between accounts

* Categories, names, notes, codes (checks)
- All the information needed for each transaction.
- Auto-complete for categories and names, or select from a list.

* Statements:
- Review all your deposits and payments by category.
- Starting and ending balance information.
- Select period by any custom date range.

* Backup and restore:
- Dropbox
- Google Drive
- Internal storage

* Powerful search:
- Search transactions by name, category, notes, codes (checks), and amount.

* Filter:
- Filter transactions by payments, deposits, verified, or any custom date range.

* Verified transactions:
- Edit the verified/unverified status of each transaction.

* No ads:
- Free and premium version 

* Premium features: (free trial for 14 days)
- Recurring (periodic) transactions: user can also add a periodic transaction manually to the ledger before the due date
- Security PIN protection
- Export data to CSV format
- Automatic backup to Dropbox and internal storage

If you have any problems with Volkron CheckBook or want to leave feedback, send an email to: checkbook@volkron.net

Help: checkbook.volkron.net/help

recentChanges:
* Bug fixed: Backup to internal storage is now working for Android Q.
* Internal improvements.
* You can long-click on a transaction on the ledger to create a duplicate (new transaction with the same information).
comments: Real good checkbook app. One thing I would like is for all accounts to show up on start. So you can choose the one you want to enter. Instead of the default account being the only one on startup. Would like the modern material design, with the option for default theme and dark mode.

Stay on top of your spending with Volkron Checkbook. I love this app and without it I would have a much harder time tracking deposits and withdrawals. I would like to see one simple improvement however that would increase the usability of the app. Instead of long pressing on an entry to duplicate it, I think it would make more sense to long press to remove a line item. Whenever you want to remove an item you have to go into the entry and click the trash icon and then confirm to remove it.

Great alternative to writing on a paper register. All the math is done for you and it' easy to correct wrong entries. I wish there was a setting that didn't allow changes to verified entries. If verified, why would you need to change it? If you're going to allow this, at least change the color so we can easily tell when something has been altered. Access from another device so others could also use it is really a must have for joint accounts.

I love this app. I'm one of those that I have to balance my checkbook to the penny or I freak out. I love that once I tap that a payment has been verified, I see the available balance of what I should have, and the verified balance, of what my bank account shows. So much easier to balance, as the verified amount should be exactly what my bank app shows. Thank you for a simple app that does exactly what I want with no extra bells and whistles that I am required to use. I haven't used any additional features yet, such as the backup, transfer, or statements, just the checkbook register.

This is exactly what I was looking for and I am beyond glad that I took a chance on trying it out. There are no ads to interfere, it's incredibly easy to learn how to use and even easier to use, period. So simple, quick and to the point to use, so easy to check at a glance on exactly where you're at in your bank account. It's so nice to be able to pay for stuff, jot in the amount on your phone at the same time, and always know your balance at any given moment. Love this!!!

title: Forex Signals & Market Trends by FX Leaders
description:
FX Leaders’ Forex signals & market trends app brings you the best trading signals, market sentiment, Forex news and trading alerts from the financial markets.

Trade Forex, Crypto, stocks and Indices with the ultimate FX trading app.
Get buy / sell signals on Forex pairs, Stocks, Cryptocurrencies and Indices.

But this Forex trading app is much more than just free Forex signals:
Traders will find here live rates and Forex charts on hundreds of instruments, real-time market updates, financial news feed, Forex trading strategies, updates, and market analysis.

App’s Interface is extremely friendly, fast, easy to use and to navigate. Traders will find it a real information station for trading.

Get free Forex signals, sent straight to your phone!
All in one easy-to-use interface.

Get also stocks signals, Crypto signals, indices and signals on commodities such as gold.

We offer live trading signals on the followings: 
• Forex currency pairs- EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY, AUD/USD, USD/CHF, USD/CAD, EUR/JPY, EUR/AUD, NZD/USD, AUD/CAD, USD/HKD, USD/MXN, GBP/AUD, USD/ZAR, USD/NOK, USD/SEC, USD/ZAR
• Cryptocurrencies- BTC, ETH, LTC, DAS, XRP
• Commodities- Gold, Silver, Oil
• Indices- DAX, S&P500, FTSE, DOW, CAC, NIKKEI225

This trading app also includes real-time​ sound and email alerts, as well as buy/sell “push” notifications, each time a signal is opened or closed.

Our trading experts base their analyses on multiple time-frames and 6 most popular technical indicators:
Fibonacci, EMA, Stochastic, RSI, Pivots and Support and Resistance levels, as well as on fundamental strategies such as trading by market sentiment, market trends and Carry Trade. Our desire is to make your Forex trading easier.

Get real time charts and live rates on all the major instruments, Crypto, commodities, indices, and on dozens of other currency pairs.

Would you like to trade smart? Now you can! anywhere, any time.

title: 10bii Financial Calculator
description:
In-App Upgrade: 10bii+ Features (Bonds, Breakeven, Depreciation, Trig, Probabilities) available!

If you believe you are having any issues with your calculator, email us and we'll generally reply within the hour and can help resolve the issue. MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

Highlights:
- Displays current N, I/YR, PV, PMT and FV values right above buttons 
- Print or Save PDF Amortization Schedules 
- Easily enter your Uneven Cashflows in a spreadsheet-like worksheet
- Video Tutorials in Help section 
- Draws Cashflow Diagrams for simple TVM or complex Uneven Cashflows 
- Saves Recent calculations so you can easily reload them 
- Easy Mode allows everyone to get the financial answers you need!

The 10bii Financial Calculator is a versatile and powerful financial calculator which features more than 105 different functions for financial analysis, business, statistics, and general mathematics. Modeled after the extremely popular 10bII Financial Calculator by Hewlett Packard, the 10bii Financial Calculator combines precise mathematics, intuitive display, and ease-of-use in one compact package. It allows you to easily calculate loan payments, interest rates, amortization, time value of money, investment value, and more using a combination of powerful and intuitive equation-writing functionality and helpful worksheets.

By expanding on HP's traditional presentation, the 10bii Financial Calculator allows quick and intuitive building and visualization of TVM (Time Value of Money) calculations and Uneven Cash Flow scenarios and lets you type in whole equations for easy review and one-touch evaluation. 

With the 10bii Financial Calculator, you can: 

Calculate Time Value of Money (Length of Term, Present Value, Nominal Interest, Loan Payments, Future Value) and see the cash flow diagram produced for you via the Graph TVM key. Values for N, PV, I, PMT, and FV are displayed right above their keys for easy reference.

Easily enter Uneven Cash Flows, including rapid calculation of Net Present Value and Internal Rate of Return. A dedicated interface makes adding, editing, deleting, and reordering uneven cash flows a breeze. 

Switch between Nominal and Effective interest rates with the simple touch of a button. 

Enter and analyze statistical data points. Includes standard calculations such as standard deviation, mean, and linear regression forecasting. 

Never has using a financial calculator been so easy or intuitive. The 10bii Financial Calculator is truly powerful enough for the professional but accessible enough for everyone. It is an ideal tool for teaching the power of compounding interest, analyzing potential deals or business ventures, or just doing math problems, and sharing the results of your work with others.

The 10bii app is the updated version of the 10b app. Also known as the 10b2.

With the 10bii Financial Calculator, you can:

Calculate Time Value of Money (Length of Term, Present Value, Nominal Interest, Loan Payments, Future Value) and see the cash flow diagram produced for you via the Graph TVM key. Values for N, PV, I, PMT, and FV are displayed right above their keys for easy reference.

Easily enter Uneven Cash Flows, including rapid calculation of Net Present Value and Internal Rate of Return. A dedicated interface makes adding, editing, deleting, and reordering uneven cash flows a breeze.

Switch between Nominal and Effective interest rates with the simple touch of a button.

Enter and analyze statistical data points. Includes standard calculations such as standard deviation, mean, and linear regression forecasting.

Never has using a financial calculator been so easy or intuitive. The 10bii Financial Calculator is truly powerful enough for the professional but accessible enough for everyone. It is an ideal tool for teaching the power of compounding interest, analyzing potential deals or business ventures, or just doing math problems, and sharing the results of your work with others.

The 10bii app is the updated version of the 10b app. Also known as the 10b2.
summary: Best. Financial Calculator. Ever. Based on HP 10bII, but easier to use!
developerAddress:
1029 E Market St
Long Beach, CA 90805
recentChanges: Increased stability.
comments: Super solid calc, that actually shows all TVM values at the same time! If I'm nitpicking, I'd say the orange and blue alt-function fonts could be a bit larger _before_ toggling them on (LG G6). They're certainly huge _after_ toggling, but then I have to toggle both to read everything. Also some button skeuomorphism would rock. Maybe tint the bottom third of each button, for that HP look? Just a thought. Still, nice work!!

This app is bewildering to me. I got this calculator so i can learn how to manage money. But the buttons have cryptic abbreviations - how can i find out what they all mean? I paid extra so I'd have every option available to me, such as Date calculations. I cant figure out how to use it, and I cant find any help in the app or on their website. This is just one of the many things on the calculator that I cant use because so much of it is unexplained. A manual or built-in help is needed!
I purchased this app and it always crashes on me. Im wondering why? I then try to reinstall the app and it takes forever to install? Does anyone have an idea why this happens??
I paid for app and tried to installed it and unable to retrieve app. something went wrong and unable to find contact to help resolve this issue.

not possible to choose whether I want to keep the screen on or not while the calculator is open. when the calculator is on the screen, the screen will remain on until it drains the battery. this app is a battery drainer... I don't like an app that drains my cell's battery with no option for me to decide how i want to use the app. I bought instead the 10BA PRO from "seritiga.pro" which has the option.

title: MoBill Budget and Reminder
description:
MoBill Budget and Reminder is a personal finance, bill reminder and budgeting app. It helps you to keep track of your bills, expenses and income easily and quickly with budgeting functions as well as reminders, reports and charts.

* Multiple account/multiple currency support
* Reminders for due bills
* Recurring Bills/Income support
* Add your own categories
* See bills and income in Monthly or Weekly periods
* Graphs
* Calendar style view visualizes expenses and income
* Cloud Sync to sync your data between your devices (Android or iOS) or share with your family (subscription required)
* Multiple payment/Partial payment against transactions (subscription required)
* In-app calculator
* Password security
* Backup / Restore
* Home screen widgets
* No internet account setup required. All data is kept in your phone
* Internet connection only required for ads

   It has simple and minimalist look with extensive features behind it. As soon as  you enter your bills and income, MoBill shows your current financial status instantly. The extensive features, such as charts and reports, helps you to analyse your finance in detail. Reminder feature generates notifications for the bills to due so you will not miss any due date.

   You can track one off or recurring bills or income, sync your data between your devices with MoBill Cloud Sync, copy your data into Google Calendar, backup your data into your Dropbox®.
    You can edit and change any occurrence of any repeating bill or income. You can view up to 3 months/weeks budget on one screen and easily change the number of visible months/weeks.
    MoBill comes with predefined categories however you can add your own categories or update existing categories.  Once you assign categories to your transactions you can see period totals by categories.
    You can add phone numbers, email, web address into bill's or income's notes and you can call the number, send email or go to web site simply by touching the links.

    You can disable ads and enable additional features by buying AdFree™ Subscription inside MoBill with 15-day money-back guarantee.

When you buy AdFree™ Subscription an additional features are enabled. Some of additional AdFree™ features are:
* No ads
* Cloud Sync. Sync your data between your devices automatically, share with your family
* Cloud Sync Web. Access your data through web app from any device
* Budget. Budget entry and compare against actual
* Multiple payment/Partial payment against transactions
* Reports. Can be emailed or saved in CSV format to open in Excel or similar programs
* Period outstanding balance carried over next period automatically
* Paid Amount entry separate than bill amount
* Decreasing Bill that rolls outstanding amount to next occurrence automatically
* Export your data into Google Calendar
* Dropbox® backup
* Transfer between accounts
* Take a photo of your bills, income and receipts and attach to a transaction
* Month Weekday recurrence. You can add bills/income like repeating every third Wednesday
* Advanced Backup/Restore. You can save with any name and you can choose the backup file to be restored
* Schedule Automatic Backup
* Home Widget that shows incoming bills and income.
* Quick Expense Entry via Home Widget
* Payment Reference
* Auto Payment that marks bill paid automatically on the due date
* Additional period types
* Email or SMS transaction detail

Please don't forget to rate on Google Play to help us improving.

Please don't hesitate to contact me for any question, problem or suggestion as I can't reply through Market Reviews.

** Please take a backup before any UPDATE **

comments: I will like this app.It works great on my tablet but I can not see all the columns on my Samsung Galaxy Note 9

Good app for simple bank accounting, but it can get technical. , I often need to edit, due to my mistakes, you put your finger on the transaction, & slide your finger up, it drags up a little edit or delete screen, thats handy. It is simple enouigh to use, but there are many more options that I do not need. A program that looks simple can always be explored for a more complex solution.
Doesn't send notifications like it used to..don't know why..settings on phone never changed..otherwise it is good app.
It works like I need it to. Could use a little polish. Does not transfer left over amount from month to month which I find strange.

Functions and runs very well. Serves a perfect purpose for me. Had a small glitch in the payment system. They gave me a response within 1.5 hours as well as the issue being resolved. Beings it was 1030 at night when I emailed, I expected an email the next day. They are on top of their stuff. Definately recommend the app.

title: ProfitTrading For Kraken - Trade much faster
description:
** New premium feature! Get notified when an order is filled, available now on Store section inside the app. You don't need to have the app open to receive the notification. **

Increase your profits at Kraken with Profit Trading! Welcome to the the quickest, easiest and best Kraken mobile client. Buy and sell faster at Kraken with a quick and easy to use interface. 
Now you can place trailing stop orders at TradingBot section with Extension Pack1!

https://profittradingapp.com/

The app is a full Kraken client with the following sections:

- Buy & sell client:
	Buy and sell any currency in Bitcoins with a quick and easy to use interface. Designed to make trading easy, you will love it. Buy and sell Bitcoin (BTC) with USD, EUR and GBP. Now included BTC, ETH, USD, EUR, CAD, GBP and JPY markets.
	
- Orders:
	Check your open and closed orders quickly. Cancel your open orders in an easy way.Kraken
	
- Wallet:
	A full list of all the currencies in your wallet with their BTC and FIAT equivalences and the total Bitcoin amount. The best place to control your cryptocurrencies.

- Charts:
	Full chart of each coin, with prices and volume history. You can also customize the time range like coinmarketcap. This is a must tool for trading. You can also track BTC realtime chart.

- TradingBot:
	Get profits with conditional orders. Configure the market, the coin and the buying and selling prices and let the bot place the orders for you, so you just have to wait and get your profits. Place an optional stoploss to be able to control disadvantage market conditions.

- TradingBot Extension Pack1:
	· TrailingStop
Take advantage of the most powerful order to make profits, TrailingStop! Your sell order will get high as the price grows!

	· AutoRestart Bot
Now you can configure trading bots to restart when finished it profit was made.

	· Bot filled orders notifications
Receive push notifications when your orders created with the trading bot are filled.

* The number of concurrent bots to be used at the same time is 25.
	
- Hodl section:
	Manage your hodl signals and track your benefits, coin buy price, amount, coin last value, signal date and coin increment. Add signals directly from your bought orders in Orders section or place them manually with the coin selector. Every signal has a direct access to its detailed chart.

- Markets ranking section:
	Check the trending markets with most benefits in last 24h. Order them by increment, price or name.

Trading at Kraken has never been so easy! Don't wait more and start increasing your profits with Profit Trading for Kraken!

Become a great trader with the app! Increase your Bitcoins now!

title: ServerLife - Tip Tracker
description:
ServerLife is the best Tip Tracker app that enables you to clearly see the money you earn.

225,000 people like you have entered over 12 Million tips!

Are you tired of never knowing exactly how much money you make because it ends up as cash in your pocket? ServerLife will solve that.

ServerLife is perfect for anyone whose income is variable and fluctuates from week to week.

Hospitality Industry (Servers, Bartenders, Hosts)
Uber & Lyft Drivers
Shoppers (Shipt, Instacart)
Hair Stylist, Barbers, Makeup Artists
Fitness and Yoga Instructors, Personal Trainers
Real Estate Agents
Sales (Commission based)
Freelancers & Entrepreneurs
Small Business Owners
Self Employed Individuals
Postmates Couriers
Independent Contractors

Enter your earnings at the end of your shift and easily see your totals. You'll be able to clearly see which days pay the best with our powerful filtering and comparison logic. 

You can easily track the following values for each entry:
- Tips
- Hours
- Notes

HISTORY
The History page will show you the total tips and wages you earned for the any week, 2 weeks, semimonthly, month and year. 

DAILY AVERAGES
Want to see the daily average for any month and year - head over to the Averages page. This page breaks down the daily averages for any month and the entire year.

REMINDERS
You can configure ServerLife to remind you to enter your tips. We all get busy and forget important things sometimes. Have ServerLife remind you to enter your tips at the same time every day.

START OF WEEK
Does your pay week start on a Tuesday? No problem you can change the start of the week so that the charts and totals will align with how you get paid. 

NEXT LEVEL
Want even more from the app? Take your tracking to the next level with the in app purchase of the Advanced features. With the in app purchase you'll be able to see:

- Work Schedule
- Credit/Cash Tips
- Expenses
- Sales Total/Tip %
- Pictures
- Hourly Wage
- Covers
- Tips/Sales per Cover
- Miles/Deliveries
- Mile and Delivery Fee
- Tip Out (Tips to others)
- Tip In (Tips to you)
- Weekly and Monthly Averages

WORK SCHEDULE
Tired of always referring back to the picture you took of the schedule? Quickly enter your weekly schedule and add default reminders so you're never late again.

EXPENSES
Have additional expenses that you payout to work, i.e. childcare, meals at work, transportation, or Tip Out multiple positions? Track them with Expense categories.

HOURLY WAGE
Want to include your hourly wage with your tips? Track your hourly wages so that your earnings are more accurate.

GOALS
Studies have shown that when you set a goal for yourself you are more likely to progress faster towards that goal. You can set daily, weekly, and monthly goals with any of the 17 fields the app calculates.

TRACK MULTIPLE JOBS
Work multiple Jobs or different Positions that have a different hourly wage? You can track the following with the in app purchase:
- Multiple Jobs, Positions (with different hourly wage), Sections, and Shifts (save the typical start and end time and it'll populate when you enter your tip)

COMPARE
Compare all of these on the Compare page. Here you can compare your Jobs, Positions, Sections, or Shifts to see which one you're making the most money.

FILTER
Once you start tracking your Jobs, Positions, Sections or Shifts you can filter any of the pages to show any combination of these. You can also filter to show Paychecks or Tips.

IMPORT YOUR DATA
Upgrading from the Just the Tips or TipSee app? Email us your latest backup file and we'll import it for you. Step by step instructions are located on the Import button on the Settings page.

SAFE AND SECURE
Your data is always safe and secure. You never have to worry about backup files or when was the last time the data synced with the cloud. All of your data is saved to our private cloud securely every time you make a change. It is available on all of your devices. Even if you lose and get a new phone your data will always be safe.

summary: Be ready for the 2020 Tax season!
recentChanges:
This release fixes a couple issues:

- An issue with restoring your purchases introduced in the last release.
- If you track hours and minutes you may have had issues getting to the minutes field. For now I've fixed this by moving the minutes field to another line.

If you love the app please leave a review, or if you have a suggestion or issue contact me from the Chat with Support on the More tab or from www.serverlifeapp.com
comments: App is great, except for obnoxiously loud ads. I understand you need ads to make money, and that's fine. But is it really necessary that those ads play at the loudest possible volume when I use the app at my restaurant. It's disturbing guests and getting me in trouble.

I've been using this for a little over 2 months now and I absolutely love it! I'm a server and it's so hard to keep up with exactly how much I make. This makes that's 100% easier. This way I can not only see what I make a month and weekly but also which days tend to be my better days! Definitely worth the download!

Absolutely perfect. Im old school and was very skeptical. I used to track EVERYTHING on paper (Tips, hours, tip out, sales, section, dry cleaning fees etc) and now its all on my phone. This app is hands down the best thing for any tipped position. I love the charts/comparison feature. Thanks for the awesome app!

Does exactly what I want to do. I watch videos for premium because I'm cheap, but the videos aren't intrusive and are very much worth it. Only thing I would like is to be able to tap on a previous day that I've worked on the calendar and see the detailed breakdown and percentage for that day. Overall great app, keep it up devs!

So i'm a full time server. I've had another app to keep up with my tips.. This one was much better. So became a premium member in 3 days using it and its been a week now. Support help was on point on helping me navigate through app. You cand add multiple jobs, different postions with thier different wages so it auto inputs when you select your postion and when putting your hours it auto calculates for you and if the tracks your tip outs.

title: Stock Screener
description:
Stock Screener app for android is free and searches the US stock market based on technical analysis and stock chart patterns for stock trading. This is a technical stock screener or stock scanner app, not a fundamental stock screener app. 

If you do online stock trading, such as swing trading or day trading, you will like this free stock screener app. You can find stocks that you want to trade to your stocks to watch list. This is an end of day technical analysis stock screener, meaning the stock quotes are updated at the end of the day. We do not offer real time stock quotes for our technical stock screener app. 

This is one of the best stock scanner app for android, but you need to have a basic understand of how the stock market works in order to utilize this technical analysis app. 

This technical stock screener app does not teach you how to trade stocks, nor does it recommend you any stocks to buy. You have to do your own stock market research and buy stocks on your own risk.

The stock charts within this app are from Finviz. They have copyright to the stock chart. The stock charts uses intraday data which is delay by 15 minutes.

There are many technical indicators that you can scan the stock market for swing trading. You will see stock charts and stock market news for each stock.

This free stock scanner for android scans for stocks based on technical indicators, it does not have any fundamental analysis data like PE ratio. If you are looking for a fundamental stock screener, this stock market app is not for you.

Below is a list of the technical indicators that you can scan with our free stock screener app for android

RSI Stock Screener - RSI Screener find oversold and overbought stocks and stocks with RSI increasing or decreasing. 

MACD Stock Screener - Macd Screener search for MACD crossover and bearish macd crossover patterns.

Moving Average Stock Screener - Moving average crossovers generate bullish signal. You can search for both sma crossover and ema crossover stocks. 

Daily Stock Gainers and Losers - Get top stock market gainers and losers.

Price Stock Screener - search stocks based on stock prices.

Volume Stock Screener - search stocks base on high volume stocks or stocks with unusual volume.

Penny Stock Screener - search for small cap stocks and penny stocks under $1, stocks under $5, stocks under $10.

Candlestick Stock Screener -  candlestick screener allows you to scan for the most popular candlestick patterns.

Bollinger Bands Stock Screener - Bollinger Bands Screener find stocks that are crossing the bollinger bands.

Stochastic Stock Screener - Stochastic can be use as a leading indicator when you use it to find overbought and oversold stocks. 

ADX Stock Screener - ADX is a technical indicator to measure the strength of a stock trend without regard to its direction. Our ADX screener gives you the ability to scan for stocks with strong trends. 

MFI Stock Screener - is a technical indicator that uses stock price and volume to measure buying and selling pressure. It can also be used to find oversold and overbought stocks.

CCI Stock Screener -  identify stock trend or warning of extreme conditions when a stock is overbought or oversold.

William %R Stock Screener - technical indicator to find overbought and oversold stocks.

Force Index Stock Screener - technical indicator that uses stock price and volume to identify strength of a stock trend.

ADL Stock Screener - is a technical indicator to measure the money flow into and out of a stock. It is a similar indicator with the OBV indicator. 

ATR Stock Screener - is a technical indicator to measure the volatility of a stock.

Find trade ideas and add to your watch list using our stock scanner. This is one of the best stock screener app android that you can use for free.

The stock charts within this app are from Finviz. They have copyright to the stock chart. The stock charts uses intraday data which is delay by 15 minutes.

There are many technical indicators that you can scan the stock market for swing trading. You will see stock charts and stock market news for each stock.

This free stock scanner for android scans for stocks based on technical indicators, it does not have any fundamental analysis data like PE ratio. If you are looking for a fundamental stock screener, this stock market app is not for you.

Below is a list of the technical indicators that you can scan with our free stock screener app for android

RSI Stock Screener - RSI Screener find oversold and overbought stocks and stocks with RSI increasing or decreasing.

MACD Stock Screener - Macd Screener search for MACD crossover and bearish macd crossover patterns.

Moving Average Stock Screener - Moving average crossovers generate bullish signal. You can search for both sma crossover and ema crossover stocks.

Daily Stock Gainers and Losers - Get top stock market gainers and losers.

Price Stock Screener - search stocks based on stock prices.

Volume Stock Screener - search stocks base on high volume stocks or stocks with unusual volume.

Penny Stock Screener - search for small cap stocks and penny stocks under $1, stocks under $5, stocks under $10.

Candlestick Stock Screener - candlestick screener allows you to scan for the most popular candlestick patterns.

Bollinger Bands Stock Screener - Bollinger Bands Screener find stocks that are crossing the bollinger bands.

Stochastic Stock Screener - Stochastic can be use as a leading indicator when you use it to find overbought and oversold stocks.

ADX Stock Screener - ADX is a technical indicator to measure the strength of a stock trend without regard to its direction. Our ADX screener gives you the ability to scan for stocks with strong trends.

MFI Stock Screener - is a technical indicator that uses stock price and volume to measure buying and selling pressure. It can also be used to find oversold and overbought stocks.

CCI Stock Screener - identify stock trend or warning of extreme conditions when a stock is overbought or oversold.

William %R Stock Screener - technical indicator to find overbought and oversold stocks.

Force Index Stock Screener - technical indicator that uses stock price and volume to identify strength of a stock trend.

ADL Stock Screener - is a technical indicator to measure the money flow into and out of a stock. It is a similar indicator with the OBV indicator.

ATR Stock Screener - is a technical indicator to measure the volatility of a stock.

Find trade ideas and add to your watch list using our stock scanner. This is one of the best stock screener app android that you can use for free.
summary: Stock Scanner App to filter stocks with technical analysis for US stock market.

title: Hot pairs FX - Real time Trending Forex Currency
description:
Why we are the life changing real time forex app?

Real time Forex analytics
Visually one of the best Forex apps in the playstore
Suitable for all kinds of traders.
Focused only on currency trading.
Innovative Forex analytics that matters in hardcore currency trading.
Informative Forex notifications.

Now see analytics of your favourite currencies like EUR/USD, GBP/USD,USD/JPY, USD/CHF, USD/CAD, AUD/USD and NZD/USD.

Hot pairs FX consists of 5 screens

Home - This screen presents the top hot trending pairs that make the most noise in the currency markets in the real time. This helps the traders determine which currency pair to put their money into when trading at the particular trading moment.

Comparison - This screen presents the comparison of top hot trending pairs between 3 timeframes that make the most noise in the currency markets at the given moment. This helps the traders determine which currency pair to put their money into when trading.

Correlation - The correlation screen shows the correlation of one currency pair with 5 other currency pairs in a descending order. So the top currency pair with number 1 is highly correlated and number 5 is least correlated to currency pair selected from the dial.

The Top 10 screen shows the real time performance of Top 10 currencies.This screen is my personal favourite as it shows top losers and gainers in 3 most important timeframes hence giving me an idea of what currency pair has gained the most value and what currency pair has lost the most value giving me good entry points for opening a trade position.

Extrapolation - The extrapolation screen shows the predicted price in the next upcoming time per the timeframe.So basically in the screen,the prices shown are the forward forecasted exchange rates of the currency pairs in next D1, W1 and MN timeframes this is an awesome screen for reference purposes of what is the possibility of the price in future.

All these screens helps you determine the trading signals for your day trading.

title: Stock Trainer: Virtual Trading (Stock Markets)
description:
Stock Markets - Virtual Stock Trading with Real Life World Market Data.

Please do not report issues or bugs via Play Store reviews. Instead, feel free to email us for support.

Stock Trainer uses real markets and their data to help beginners make their first steps in the world of stock investment. Learn trading with our real market simulator and use it as a guide for your future investments.

Keep in mind that while described as a simulator, this app is not a simulation and works with real market data to give you as close to real life results as possible. 

NOTE: For those concerned about the "Identity" permission, it is strictly used for Google Sign In for the App. If you do not use Google Sign In and instead use other medium for Signing In, then "Identity" permission will not be executed.

One of the advantages of this app is that it let's you test the waters before you jump in. If you are new to investment, and think you have what it takes to be a Stock Market Mogul, then I suggest you try this app first before investing your real money. In this simulator, everything is virtual, there is therefore nothing to lose.

This app is for stock market investors - both new and experienced. Investors new to stock market can try out the market without investing real money. Investors that are experienced can use this app to devise a strategy that works for them. Regardless of your experience with the market, you have intuition about certain stocks but are too afraid to invest; try it out here and test out your instincts.

Please understand that this is a Beta version, and we have many more exciting features coming shortly.

Note that this app is works with real market data to give you as close to real life results as possible.

STANDARD FEATURES
• 20 world stock markets supported.
• Support for Stop-loss and Limit orders.
• Portfolio and Watchlist management.
• Top gainers and top losers information provided.
• Beautiful stock charts dating back to 10+ years.
• Zoom option for stock charts.
• Extensive stock news.
• Business magazine.
• Account summary with great looking graphics.
• Support for multiple themes, including Night theme.

PREMIUM FEATURES
• No Ads.
• Automatic daily backups on fault tolerant Firebase Cloud.
• Candlestick Charts.

FEATURES FOR U.S. STOCK ONLY
• Financial information like EPS, P/E, Dividend yield, etc.
• Insider trades information.
• TipRanks analysis for stocks.
• Income statement, balance sheet and cash flow statement.

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
https://www.facebook.com/StockTrainer/ or e-mail at alifesoftware@gmail.com

Please don't contact support through reviews. It is humble request to report bugs, issues, or communicate questions over e-mail or Facebook page.

☺ If you are happy with the app, do show your encouragement for us by reviewing the app with 5 stars.

comments: I downloaded it yesterday, It seems like a nice concept but maybe due to some technical glitches I'm unable to fetch the share details (not able to buy, sale, or watch). Thus, I feel I am wasting my much of time for nothing. I look forward for improvement.

Nice app GLITCH FOUND: If I were to buy a share at 90(current price) at 11am and order a sell with limit 120, and restart the app, it will sell the share if the price was higher than 120 even before 11am. SUGGESTION: note a time stamp for sell order and execute order only when share price go higher than limit price after the time stamp of sell order.

I really enjoy this simulator for the fact that it aligns with the market beautifully. The only criticisms I give it is that it doesn't sell options and you can trade when the market closes to take the after hours profits without any risk involved. Overall great app I reccomend using it if you're trying to learn how to invest or just want some practice under your belt before you start really investing into the stock market.

I'm enjoying the app. I wonder if there's a sort of a glossary or index that helps us understand the numbers and tips on what to look for in a stock regarding its performance history and media info that can influence buying and selling. Secondly, it says you can ask for more in app money. I've tried but it's like there's nothing there. Anyway, I'm enjoying it, it's the closest you can be to playing the stock market without loosing your shirt.

This app is a great tool to learn how the stock market works and how to buy/sell stocks. The $5 for premium is extremely affordable and allows you to have the ability to buy/sell unlimited amounts of stocks, without having to watch an ad once you go over the daily amount. I see a lot of complaints in the review section and those people are apparently extremely ignorant and shouldn't even have a smart phone, let alone try to invest in stocks.

title: Invstr: Play. Learn. Invest.
description:
Invstr is an award-winning app that helps aspiring investors learn to invest. Learn with Academy and practice your skills by playing Fantasy Finance®. When you’re ready to trade for real, start investing from $1. 

“Turn Gaming into Investing” - FinTech Futures
 
“A game changer, demystifying the complicated trading markets” - Appnews.co.uk
 
LEARN WITH ACADEMY
Academy is a 10-module interactive course that teaches you everything you need to know about investing and the financial markets, including stocks, cryptos, and key strategies. Test your knowledge with quizzes and earn badges along the way to track your progress.
 
PLAY FANTASY FINANCE®
Build a portfolio with $1M in virtual cash. Compete with players around the world to win cash prizes. 
 
• Trade stocks to increase your portfolio’s value
• The higher the return on your investment, the higher you’ll place in the monthly Invstr Fantasy League
• Finish in the top 10 to win real cash prizes
• Earn rewards & unlock features
• Bite-sized stats & insights help you make the right call at the right time
• Follow other players to get tips and stay up-to-date
 
GO PREMIUM
Access game-changing features, all 10 Academy modules, and start each month with at least $1M of virtual cash.
 
• 10-module interactive investing course
• Extra trades
• An unlimited watchlist
• Double XP
• Flexible portfolio allocation
• Technical analysis charts
• Monthly capital insurance
• Private trading mode
 
PRIVATE LEAGUES
Start your own private league and challenge friends, family, colleagues, or classmates to a trade-off. Put your investment skills to the test and see who earns the bragging rights.
 
• Ideal for schools and investment clubs
• Quick & easy to set up and run
• A fun way to learn with friends
 
INVEST FOR REAL
When you’re ready to trade for real, start investing from just $1. 
 
• Invest from just $1 via fractional share trading of U.S. stocks
• Pay only $0.99 commission when trading part of a share, and from $2.99 for whole shares
• All accounts are protected by SIPC (The Securities Investor Protection Corporation) against losses in securities and cash due to brokerage bankruptcy
 
MONITOR THE MARKETS
Make smarter decisions with:
 
• Glance Cards for each instrument, with an Instrument Score calculated from key signals and Invstr community-based sentiment
• Live Interactive Charts for 2,500+ global stocks, bonds, commodities, currencies, futures, indices, and cryptocurrencies
• Personalized, up-to-the-minute market news from 50+ top financial publishers
 
VISIT US
https://invstr.com
 
FOLLOW US
twitter.com/invstreams
facebook.com/invstr
instagram.com/invstr
 
MORE INFO
T&Cs: https://invstr.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://invstr.com/privacy
 
Disclosures:
Invstr is a technology platform, not a registered broker-dealer or registered investment adviser, and does not provide investment advice. All investing carries risk. Past performance is not indicative of future returns, which may vary. US brokerage services, including fractional trading of US securities, are provided to Invstr users by DriveWealth LLC, an SEC registered broker-dealer and a regulated member of FINRA/SIPC.
Terms of use: http://bit.ly/2T8zGo0
Fees schedule: http://bit.ly/2T6KW4A
Fractional shares disclosure: http://bit.ly/2DAVODc
Due to Canadian and Australian regulations DriveWealth LLC, can’t on-board users from these countries.

title: FundSpec : Stock Analysis, Financial Models & Data
description:
FundSpec gives you all the tools you need to analyze today's complex financial markets!
Make use of our full suite of fundamental and technical analysis tools to find your next investment idea. Get realtime price alerts on stocks, currencies & cryptocurrencies. Build sophisticated financial models in simple, easy steps! Invest in the stock market with confidence!

Real Time Quotes & Price Alert Notifications
 ✔ Over 5000 US Equities
 ✔ Over 1500 Crypto Currencies
 ✔ Over 175 Currency Pairs
 ✔ Commodities
 ✔ Global Equities from over 30 countries

Financial News & Sentiment
FundSpec gives you access to all the latest financial news on stocks, currencies, crypto & commodities. Looking to gauge the sentiment for your favorite stocks on social media? Use our unique social sentiment model to determine bullish/bearish bias among traders and investors commenting on social media using the company's cashtag. 

Fundamental Analysis
FundSpec has all the data you need to analyze your favorite stocks. Review all the data we have to offer to analyze the financial health of the companies before making your next investment.
 ✔ Analyst Price Targets & Recommendations
 ✔ Consensus Earnings Estimates, Earnings Surprise & YOY Performance
 ✔ Upcoming Earnings Reports
 ✔ Insider Transactions
 ✔ Top Institutional & Fund Holders
 ✔ Fundamental Metrics over a dozen categories & Financial Data from the company's SEC Filings

Technical Analysis
FundSpec offers over a dozen technical indicators including Moving Average Convergence Divergence (MACD), Rate of Change (ROC), Money Flow Index (MFI), Average Directional Index (ADX), Relative Strength Indicator (RSI), On Balance Volume (OBV), Aroon Up/Down, Average True Range (ATR), Chaikin Money Flow (CMF), William %R, Stochastic Oscillator, Accumulation Distribution Line (ADL) as well as open high low close (OHLC) charts, moving averages and pivot points. 

Looking to dig a little deeper? Use our Deep Learning Model to harness the power to Neural Networks to find patterns in price action and volume data.

Financial Models
FundSpec gives you access to our unique Relative Value Model which determines fair value based on a cohort of comparable companies with business fundamentals most similar to the target company in a large N-dimensional feature space of fundamental features. We also offer Sector & Industry RV Models that compare a stock to a cohort of companies just in its industry or across its entire sector.

We have trained a Deep Neural Network (DNN) to identify bullish/bearish patterns based on 20 years of price action and volume data over hundreds of stocks and its output is captured in our Momentum Model.

You will also be able to build your own sophisticated Discounted Cashflow Models, Relative Value Models, Scenario Analysis Models and Deep Learning Pattern Match Models. 

 ✔ Discounted Cashflow Models (DCF): Single/multi-stage models with custom terminal values based on exit multiples (Price/Earnings, Price/Sales, Price/FCF).
 ✔ Relative Value Models: Build relative value models either by specifying the comparable companies or using our sophisticated algorithm to determine the cohort of companies. Our algorithm identifies the companies most similar to your target company in a large N-dimensional feature space of fundamental features specified by you. You will also pick the metrics you want to use to determine fair value.
 ✔ Scenario Analysis Models: Specify multiple Bull/Bear scenarios for the business fundamentals of the target company and our sophisticated algorithm will determine fair value metrics for each scenario and discount it back to a fair value for the company today based on your required rate of return.
 ✔ Deep Learning Pattern Match Models: Neural Networks are a very powerful tool to find patterns in data. Build your own custom Deep Learning models to find patterns in price action and volume data of individual stocks in simple, easy to understand steps.

comments: Wow! I am impressed by this app. I just started the free trial, but I will continue the monthly $4.99 payment. One of my favorite things is that it tells me the updated news on each and every individual stock that I list in my watchlist. I no longer have to google each one every morning. This app is just AMAZING! I can tell when my stock is bullish/bearish....undervalued/overvalued.... and where analysts think the price target should be. Kudos to the developers on this app. Very very pleased!!

This is a very good app with lots of useful data. But what really got me to write this review is that this finally is a stock market app with actionable data and minimal ads. Most other finance apps are overloaded with obnoxious ads and ask you to subscribe just to make the experience bearable. Thank you FundSpec for respecting your users and providing a wonderful experience for your free users as well!!
Easy to use. The app has many useful functions & features.
Very easy and useful. Use it everyday.
The format in which you present the data is more concise and clear than I have seen on most financial and investment platforms.

title: Spending Tracker
description:
Spending Tracker is the easiest and most user friendly expense manager app in the store. The simple fact is, by tracking your spending you will be able to stick to a budget and therefore SAVE MONEY. So download it for free, enter your expenses and income, and have instant control over your spending!

★ Features ★ 
---------------
✔ Simple and intuitive user interface 
- helps you to easily manage your spending
- super fast expense entry

✔ Flexible Time Periods 
- choose to track Weekly, Monthly or Yearly 

✔ Budget Mode 
- optionally set a fixed budget amount to help you meet your spending targets 
- carry over any remaining budget to the next month or week 

✔ Summary View 
- overview of your current balance along with expense and income totals
- see your main areas of spending

✔ Log Expense and Income 
- repeat transactions daily, weekly or monthly
- export to CSV for use in a spreadsheet
- export to PDF for viewing and printing (Pro Upgrade required)

✔ Multiple Accounts
- create separate personal, business and savings accounts for example

✔ Reports 
- beautiful and interactive charts allow easy visualisation of where your money goes
- view spending grouped by category 
- see your history so you can track your progress

✔ Categories 
- editable expense and income categories 
- choose a quality icon for each category

✔ Syncing (Pro Upgrade required)
- automatically sync your data to other Android devices
- you can also sync to iOS and Windows versions of Spending Tracker, which will require a separate upgrade on these platforms

✔ Backups
- keep your data safe by backing up to Dropbox
- the auto backups feature will take care of it for you

✔ Widget
- put the widget on your home screen for easy access
- quick add buttons

✔ Local Tips
- optionally receive tips when you enter participating local venues (requires location and bluetooth permissions)
- this could include money saving offers

✔ Special design layout for tablets
- optimal use of larger screen size makes it even better for managing your money
descriptionHTML:
Spending Tracker is the easiest and most user friendly expense manager app in the store. The simple fact is, by tracking your spending you will be able to stick to a budget and therefore SAVE MONEY. So download it for free, enter your expenses and income, and have instant control over your spending!

★ Features ★
---------------
✔ Simple and intuitive user interface
- helps you to easily manage your spending
- super fast expense entry

✔ Flexible Time Periods
- choose to track Weekly, Monthly or Yearly

✔ Budget Mode
- optionally set a fixed budget amount to help you meet your spending targets
- carry over any remaining budget to the next month or week

✔ Summary View
- overview of your current balance along with expense and income totals
- see your main areas of spending

✔ Log Expense and Income
- repeat transactions daily, weekly or monthly
- export to CSV for use in a spreadsheet
- export to PDF for viewing and printing (Pro Upgrade required)

✔ Multiple Accounts
- create separate personal, business and savings accounts for example

✔ Reports
- beautiful and interactive charts allow easy visualisation of where your money goes
- view spending grouped by category
- see your history so you can track your progress

✔ Categories
- editable expense and income categories
- choose a quality icon for each category

✔ Syncing (Pro Upgrade required)
- automatically sync your data to other Android devices
- you can also sync to iOS and Windows versions of Spending Tracker, which will require a separate upgrade on these platforms

✔ Backups
- keep your data safe by backing up to Dropbox
- the auto backups feature will take care of it for you

✔ Widget
- put the widget on your home screen for easy access
- quick add buttons

✔ Local Tips
- optionally receive tips when you enter participating local venues (requires location and bluetooth permissions)
- this could include money saving offers

✔ Special design layout for tablets
- optimal use of larger screen size makes it even better for managing your money
summary: Track your expenses, stick to a budget, save money. It's that simple!
developerAddress: Solo House The Courtyard, London Road, Horsham, RH12 1AT
recentChanges:
Version 2.3.1 of Spending Tracker
============================
* Startup performance improvement
* Spending can now be tracked on a 'Daily' basis
* Many new category icons have been added, and icons are now organised into groups
* Choose whether to show 'Outline' or 'Filled' icons under 'Settings -> Category Icon Style'
* Option to remove a category's icon (useful if using a colour 'emoji' in the category name instead)
comments: I absolutely adore this app! I've had this app since 2010... and I had stopped using it for a few years after my spending habits got under control! 10 years later I was looking for an app to help me keep track of my expenses in place of spreadsheets. I stumbled upon this app again and realized it was what I needed at the time. I'm so happy to use it. It helps me consciously understand and be mindful of my money. Thank you for making this app!
great way of tracking what you spend!!

Easy to use and gets the job done. Which is good. However i don't like the idea of everything that happened in 2019 and before to become irrelevant because of their yearly/monthly filters. Would be nice if we can view "last 6 months" or last year. To include data from previous months. Also we can only filter one category at a time, which seems an easy fix. Would be nice if we can filter 2 or more categories for a comparison. Etc

Awesome so far. I'm finally getting all my finances in order. While it's amazing what you spend If you keep track it. So far very few ads and the app is running perfectly not a single hitch. So after one month I am deeply impressed. I never a take the time to read an app.. This time I am making an exception. Good job.

It does what it says - it helps me track my spending. Easy to use. Functionally useful. MS Money it is not but for day to day tracking and cash flow monitoring it fits my bill. Had a couple of queries early on but received prompt responses which sorted me out. Would recommend it.

title: Penny Stocks: OTC & Penny Stock Screener & Tracker
description:
Penny Stocks helps you find the best penny stocks to buy with just one click

This #1 OTC & Penny stocks filter & scanner app can screen OTC & penny stocks by the stock prices, stock volumes, stock sectors, and many of their stock technical and fundamental parameters.

The unique features:

SCREENING OTC & PENNY STOCKS:
Penny Stocks Builder allows you to find potential penny stocks to invest by adding as many criteria as you want.
Ex: Find all the penny stocks that price < $1 & volume > $500k.
With one or two clicks you can find the right penny stocks to invest:
- By penny stocks sector: Technology, Energy, Healthcare, Finance, etc.
- By penny stocks price: Under $1, $1-$2, $2-$5 & Over $5
- By penny stocks volume: Under $300k, $300k-$500k & Over $500k
- By many other penny stocks fundamental & technical parameters

And you can SAVE your screeners for quick access with one click (only at this Penny Stocks app)

OTC & PENNY STOCKS WATCHLIST
- Track your favorite stocks
- Access to saved screeners

OTC & PENNY STOCK NEWS:
- Stocks News: breaking news for any stock
- Stock Discussion: stay up-to-date with the stock market

OTC & PENNY STOCK TECHNICAL & FUNDAMENTAL ANALYSIS
- Stock charts: 1D, 5D, 5M, etc
- Stock chart types: line, candle & bar charts
- Stock statistics: P/C, Market Cap, Open, Low, High, etc

Disclaimer: Penny Stocks Screener is only a useful tool to find & track penny stocks. This app is not responsible for profits, revenues, or data and financial losses.

comments: The paid version is excellent. No adds, no crashes, accurate information. The paid app is worth it if you're really into penny stock study on the go. One star off bc of the black background interface. You can't change it, seems like. But that's an aesthetic thing. If you like that, consider this a 5-star review.

It works very well, better after I subscribed for 5 bucks. Sometimes it takes a little long to load some searches, but I figure it's the perfect opportunity to gain patience since patience is a critical characteristic to have as a successful trader. Thanks for the app. They do improve gradually.
Good app but when searching and scrolling and after refining your list it will display an ad. After the ad it will reset your list back to square one, aggravating
This is all very new to me. But it is easy to navigate.
It doesn'tclet you filter sometime like it gets stuck
